MESSAGE.JP: れから、二日ばかり過ごした後のことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: This is something that happened exactly two days later.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is something that happened exactly two days later.

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@「えー、棗」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Err... Natsume.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Err... Natsume.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突に名前を呼ばれ、自分の席でぴょこんと体を跳ねさせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaped up from her chair after being suddenly called by the teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaped up from her chair after being suddenly called by the teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@「おまえはＨＲが終わったら、職員室まで一緒にこい。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝After homeroom, you're to come with me to the faculty office. Got it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝After homeroom, you're to come with me to the faculty office. Got it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、あいつ、悪いことでもしたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did she do something bad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did she do something bad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃ、オレたちは練習にいくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, time to practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, time to practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「心配だけど…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm worried about her, but... Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm worried about her, but... Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 習を始めて１時間ぐらい経っただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Roughly one hour passed since we started practicing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Roughly one hour passed since we started practicing.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「お、戻ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, there she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, there she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の様子はいつも通りで、怒られたわけでも、褒められたわけでもなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't look any different from usual, it didn't seem like she had been scolded nor praised.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't look any different from usual, it didn't seem like she had been scolded nor praised.

MESSAGE.JP: はいつものように、グローブを取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like always, she picked up the glove.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like always, she picked up the glove.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の背に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her as she stood in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her as she stood in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「別の学校に行ってくれと言われた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was told to go to another school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was told to go to another school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ちになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bolted upright.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bolted upright.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What... What's that supposed to mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What... What's that supposed to mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったく話が見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't make heads or tails of what she had said.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't make heads or tails of what she had said.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「転校？　そんなの言い渡せるわけないのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Changing schools? There's no way they can make you do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Changing schools? There's no way they can make you do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんか難しい話だったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's a complicated matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's a complicated matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「聞かせてよ、どんな話だったの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then tell me! What did they say to you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then tell me! What did they say to you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は問いつめる。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed her to answer my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed her to answer my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ？　落ち着け、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? Calm down, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? Calm down, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「落ち着いてなんていられないって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can I possibly stay calm!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can I possibly stay calm!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだなんだ？とみんなが集まり始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone started gathering around us, wondering what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone started gathering around us, wondering what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: から正確な話を聞き出すのは難しい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was difficult to get a coherent story out of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was difficult to get a coherent story out of her.

MESSAGE.JP: 接担任に訊きに行こう。僕はみんなを残して、職員室へと走った。
MESSAGE.EN: I should ask our homeroom teacher directly. I left everyone behind and headed for the faculty office.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should ask our homeroom teacher directly. I left everyone behind and headed for the faculty office.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「難しい話だな…もっとかいつまんで話してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's too complicated... What's this all about in a nutshell?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's too complicated... What's this all about in a nutshell?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「かいつまんだら、もっとわけわからんなるだろ、ばか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I sum up the story, it will make even less sense, idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I sum up the story, it will make even less sense, idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ようは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝To put it simply.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝To put it simply.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つだって見てきた絵だ。恭介が中心になり、話をまとめ始める。
MESSAGE.EN: It happened every time. Everyone's attention turned to Kyousuke, who started explaining everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It happened every time. Everyone's attention turned to Kyousuke, who started explaining everything.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「交換留学生みたいなもんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's something similar to a student exchange program.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's something similar to a student exchange program.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ウチの学校の生徒と、併設校の生徒をしばらくの間交換するわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Our school is going to exchange some of its students with the other school for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Our school is going to exchange some of its students with the other school for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そこなんだが、事情は深刻だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There are some complicated circumstances.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There are some complicated circumstances.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その併設校に通っていた、とあるグループが、この春休みに旅行先で事故に遭ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As they were going on a school trip during the spring holidays, a certain group of students from our sister school got into an accident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As they were going on a school trip during the spring holidays, a certain group of students from our sister school got into an accident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の事故は、僕も新聞で知っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had read about the incident in the newspapers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had read about the incident in the newspapers.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「交通事故だ。たったふたりしか助からなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It was a traffic accident. Only two students survived.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It was a traffic accident. Only two students survived.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「詳しく知りたい奴は、図書室で調べてくれ。事件を報じた新聞がスクラップにしてとっておいてある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If anyone wants to know the details, you can go to the library. They still have the newspaper articles with information regarding the accident.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If anyone wants to know the details, you can go to the library. They still have the newspaper articles with information regarding the accident.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そのグループは、交友関係も広く、同級生に与えたショックは計り知れなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Said group had a lot of friends. Imagine how shocked the other students must have been.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Said group had a lot of friends. Imagine how shocked the other students must have been.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「４月から授業は普通に行われているが、校内は…重い空気に包まれたままだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝School started like always in April, but... it was filled with a solemn atmosphere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝School started like always in April, but... it was filled with a solemn atmosphere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その事件のショックで、彼らは一様に心を病んでしまったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This accident caused psychological damage to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This accident caused psychological damage to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「彼らには、心のケアが必要と判断された」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It was decided that they require psychological care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It was decided that they require psychological care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そこで今回のプランが提案された」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And so a plan was proposed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And so a plan was proposed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「健康な心を持った生徒を迎え入れて、校内に活気を取り戻そう、というものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They're going to get some students with a wholesome spirit into the school to bring the lively atmosphere back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They're going to get some students with a wholesome spirit into the school to bring the lively atmosphere back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それが生徒たちの、心のケアに繋がる。交換とは名目だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This is supposed to have a therapeutic effect on the students. The whole plan is disguised as a student exchange program.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This is supposed to have a therapeutic effect on the students. The whole plan is disguised as a student exchange program.❞

MESSAGE.JP: し終えたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That seemed to finish his explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: That seemed to finish his explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「理由はわかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I understand the reason...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I understand the reason...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、どうして、それが鈴に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But why does it have to be Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But why does it have to be Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は疑問を口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I expressed my doubt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I expressed my doubt.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「この間、お偉方を案内して差し上げただろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't she escort those big shots the other day?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't she escort those big shots the other day?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その時に鈴が気に入られたみたいだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It seems that they took to her that time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It seems that they took to her that time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「もしかしたら初めから目的は、そっちのほうだったのかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Maybe THAT was their real goal to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Maybe THAT was their real goal to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「併設校を回って、探していたようだ。鈴の他にも、他校からも何人か行くことになってるらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It seems that they were going around from one sister school to another looking for suitable students. There will be other people than Rin that go there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It seems that they were going around from one sister school to another looking for suitable students. There will be other people than Rin that go there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はどうしてこんなに何でも知ってるんだ。知りすぎている…。
MESSAGE.EN: How come he knows everything? He just always knows way too much...
MESSAGE.Translation: How come he knows everything? He just always knows way too much...

MESSAGE.JP: が担任から聞き出せなかったことだらけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had asked our homeroom teacher, but he barely knew anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had asked our homeroom teacher, but he barely knew anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は…その話、知ってたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... Did you know all that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... Did you know all that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、今日鈴の話を聞いてから調べたんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, I did some research today when I heard about it from Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, I did some research today when I heard about it from Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れまでにわかっていたなら、防げたはずなのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: If he knew all that, shouldn't he have prevented it...
MESSAGE.Translation: If he knew all that, shouldn't he have prevented it...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴、俺の力でわかったのはこれぐらいだが、大体合ってるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, this is all I could find out, is it more or less accurate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, this is all I could find out, is it more or less accurate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ぴったり合ってるな。正解だ。後でなんかやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Accurate to every detail. All is correct. Now do something about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Accurate to every detail. All is correct. Now do something about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「その併設校ってやらは、遠いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Is that sister school or something far?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Is that sister school or something far?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まあ、遠いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「期間は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How long would you go there for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How long would you go there for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「少なくとも一学期は、と言われた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝At least one term, I was told.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝At least one term, I was told.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「向こうも全寮制だから、行ってしまうとしばらくは会えなくなるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That school is a boarding school as well, so if you go there, we won't see you for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That school is a boarding school as well, so if you go there, we won't see you for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「週末に外出の許可は下りるんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wouldn't she be able to go outside on weekends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wouldn't she be able to go outside on weekends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「二週間に一度は戻ってきていいらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's okay to come back once every two weeks, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's okay to come back once every two weeks, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「すでに具体的に決まってんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's like it's all set in stone already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's like it's all set in stone already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は…空気を読めずにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I... couldn't figure out how everyone else felt about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... couldn't figure out how everyone else felt about it.

MESSAGE.JP: んながどう思っているか。
MESSAGE.EN: What everyone else thought about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: What everyone else thought about it.

MESSAGE.JP: の声色から判断できずにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell a thing from the tone of their voices.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell a thing from the tone of their voices.

MESSAGE.JP: がどう思ってるかすらも。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even know what Rin herself thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even know what Rin herself thought.

MESSAGE.JP: もそも…
MESSAGE.EN: Actually...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴に向いていないよ…そんな役回り」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin... Rin isn't cut for this role.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin... Rin isn't cut for this role.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気を読まないまま…僕は自分のわがままを口にしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought little of what the others felt at that moment... I was acting like a selfish little brat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought little of what the others felt at that moment... I was acting like a selfish little brat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかしいじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is ridiculous...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is ridiculous...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らの中で、一番適任じゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's the least fitting for this role among us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's the least fitting for this role among us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ずっと僕らの後ろにいて…気が向いた時だけ出てくるような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She would always stand behind us... She only showed herself when she felt like it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She would always stand behind us... She only showed herself when she felt like it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「世間知らずで…人付き合いが下手で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She knows so little of the world... She's terrible at dealing with people...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She knows so little of the world... She's terrible at dealing with people...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして、そんな鈴が選ばれるのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why was she picked...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why was she picked...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それは…この春までの話だろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that... how she was until this spring?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that... how she was until this spring?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ…恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on... Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on... Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてそんな言い方するんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you saying it like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you saying it like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まるで、鈴に行ってほしいみたいじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like you want her to go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like you want her to go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「落ち着け、理樹。そんなことは言っていない。俺は事実を言っただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Calm down, Riki. I never said that. I only told the truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Calm down, Riki. I never said that. I only told the truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それが事実だからこそ、お偉方は鈴を選んだんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's the truth, otherwise she wouldn't have been chosen for this role, would she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's the truth, otherwise she wouldn't have been chosen for this role, would she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「昔のままの鈴だったら、選ばれてないさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin wouldn't have been chosen if she was still the same way as before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin wouldn't have been chosen if she was still the same way as before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはみんなで頑張ったからじゃないか、練習までしてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it because we all helped her? We even practiced together!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it because we all helped her? We even practiced together!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな。でも結果を出したのは鈴だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's right. But it was she who produced the results.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's right. But it was she who produced the results.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴自身なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin herself, not anybody else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin herself, not anybody else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それは俺たちのせいなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that our fault?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that our fault?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺たちは…悪いことをしたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Did we... do something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Did we... do something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「待ってよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が混乱する。
MESSAGE.EN: I was bewildered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was bewildered.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、僕と恭介が一対一で話してるんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Why am I debating this with Kyousuke?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why am I debating this with Kyousuke?

MESSAGE.JP: 問されてるんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Why is he interrogating me?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is he interrogating me?

MESSAGE.JP: けがわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: This doesn't make any sense...
MESSAGE.Translation: This doesn't make any sense...

MESSAGE.JP: 題はそんなところにないはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: That isn't where the issue lies.
MESSAGE.Translation: That isn't where the issue lies.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は祈るように鈴を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I pleaded to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pleaded to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴はどう思ってるの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you think, Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you think, Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I hate this idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I hate this idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: われた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was saved.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was saved.

MESSAGE.JP: んて痛快な一言だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words were like a balm to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words were like a balm to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 介がなんと言おうが、当事者の鈴が嫌なら、誰も強制できないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what Kyousuke might say, if Rin herself opposed the idea, no one would make her go by force.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what Kyousuke might say, if Rin herself opposed the idea, no one would make her go by force.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「断ろうよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should say no to them, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should say no to them, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行きたくないって言ってやればいいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell them you don't want to go anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell them you don't want to go anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もちろんそう言ってやった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Of course I already did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Of course I already did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did they answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did they answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もう少し時間をやるからもっとよく考えてみてくれと言われた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝They told me I have some more time and urged me to think it through one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝They told me I have some more time and urged me to think it through one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もっとよく考えてみることにした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I decided to think it through one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I decided to think it through one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は頭を抱える。
MESSAGE.EN: I clutched my head with my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I clutched my head with my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: はそんなことを考えるような子だったのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was she ever the kind of person to think deeply about this kind of thing?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she ever the kind of person to think deeply about this kind of thing?

MESSAGE.JP: たちとずっと一緒にいた鈴は…もっと短絡的で、もっと聞き分けが悪かったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was always with us... Always disobedient, always jumping to conclusions.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was always with us... Always disobedient, always jumping to conclusions.

MESSAGE.JP: かしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: This doesn't make sense...
MESSAGE.Translation: This doesn't make sense...

MESSAGE.JP: か変だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something is wrong...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something is wrong...

MESSAGE.JP: や…変じゃなくて、その逆だ。
MESSAGE.EN: No... Not wrong. The opposite.
MESSAGE.Translation: No... Not wrong. The opposite.

MESSAGE.JP: ―つじつまが合いすぎてるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――The pieces of the puzzle fit all too well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――The pieces of the puzzle fit all too well.

MESSAGE.JP: かが鈴を変えてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Something has changed Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something has changed Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: れはひとつしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: And there's only one thing that could have done that.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there's only one thing that could have done that.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンの手紙だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The letter that Lennon brought.
MESSAGE.Translation: The letter that Lennon brought.

MESSAGE.JP: こからすべてが始まり、今に至っているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's where everything started, where things went wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's where everything started, where things went wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえが悩んでどうするんだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There's no need for you to get worried, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There's no need for you to get worried, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んと恭介の手が頭に触れる。
MESSAGE.EN: He put his hand on my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: He put his hand on my head.

MESSAGE.JP: は…あれだけ頼もしかった手が…他人の手のように冷たく感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: That hand of his I could always rely on... now felt cold like that of a complete stranger.
MESSAGE.Translation: That hand of his I could always rely on... now felt cold like that of a complete stranger.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴はとりあえず、保留にしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin has put it on hold for the time being.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin has put it on hold for the time being.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ後は鈴が答えを出すまで待つしかないだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now we can only wait until she has her answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now we can only wait until she has her answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなの気持ちはどうするんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about everyone's feelings...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about everyone's feelings...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は泣きそうな声で言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, almost crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, almost crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴が訊きたければ訊くし、言いたい奴は言うさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If she wants to ask someone, she will, and if someone wants to tell her something, who's to stop them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If she wants to ask someone, she will, and if someone wants to tell her something, who's to stop them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃあ…
MESSAGE.EN: Then...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then...

MESSAGE.JP: も…気持ちを伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: I too... have to let her know my feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I too... have to let her know my feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: に、僕の気持ちを伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going to tell her how I feel.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going to tell her how I feel.

MESSAGE.JP: れたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't want to be separated from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't want to be separated from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 緒に学校生活を送っていきたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to spend our student lives together.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to spend our student lives together.

MESSAGE.JP: にいてほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I want her to be by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want her to be by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: の思い、すべてを。
MESSAGE.EN: I will tell her everything that's on my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will tell her everything that's on my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: れが――
MESSAGE.EN: This was――
MESSAGE.Translation: This was――

MESSAGE.JP: の恋の始まりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: the beginning of my love.
MESSAGE.Translation: the beginning of my love.

MESSAGE.JP: 人はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato wasn't here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato wasn't here.

MESSAGE.JP: 夜はふたりきりにしてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: He had left us alone together this evening.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had left us alone together this evening.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹は…あたしに行ってほしくない…そんなふうに思ってる気がするんだが、そうなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki... I have a feeling that you don't want me to go, but do you really feel that way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki... I have a feeling that you don't want me to go, but do you really feel that way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「当然だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって、鈴は僕の彼女なんだよ。恋人がいなくなるのはもちろん寂しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're my girlfriend. Of course I'd feel lonely if you were gone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're my girlfriend. Of course I'd feel lonely if you were gone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゃっと鳴いて、向こうを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned away from me in embarrassment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned away from me in embarrassment.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「慣れないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not used to that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not used to that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…慣れる時間もなかったからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because... we didn't have time to get used to it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because... we didn't have time to get used to it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恋人らしい時間も何もなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We didn't have time to act like boyfriend and girlfriend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We didn't have time to act like boyfriend and girlfriend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「試合も終わってさ、これからだって思ってたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that the match is behind us, I thought so many things were going to happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that the match is behind us, I thought so many things were going to happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「これから…なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going to happen... Like what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going to happen... Like what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「言わせたいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you want me to tell you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you want me to tell you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「興味はあるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It does interest me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It does interest me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「愛を深めていく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're going to strengthen our relationship...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're going to strengthen our relationship...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーむ、おまえ真顔だぞ、すごいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, you have such a serious look on your face, incredible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, you have such a serious look on your face, incredible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「言う時は言うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I say what needs to be said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I say what needs to be said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「愛を…深めていくのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Strengthen... our relationship, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Strengthen... our relationship, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹とあたしの愛をか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki's and my relationship...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki's and my relationship...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーみゅ、とうつむいてしまう。耳まで真っ赤だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast down her eyes and turned red.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast down her eyes and turned red.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それは…きっと楽しいんだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm sure... it's going to be a lot of fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sure... it's going to be a lot of fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の一言が嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was happy to hear her say that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was happy to hear her say that.

MESSAGE.JP: たちは恋人同士なんだと自信が持てた。
MESSAGE.EN: It reassured me of our relationship.
MESSAGE.Translation: It reassured me of our relationship.

MESSAGE.JP: う、これから楽しい時間が待ってるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There are great things waiting for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are great things waiting for us.

MESSAGE.JP: てなく続いているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They're going to continue forever and ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: They're going to continue forever and ever.

MESSAGE.JP: から、こんなところで離ればなれになる必要もないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why there's no reason for us to be separated.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why there's no reason for us to be separated.

MESSAGE.JP: でに鈴は、この学校の代表として選出されるほど、頑張って強くなった。
MESSAGE.EN: She worked so hard that she was even chosen as the representative of our school.
MESSAGE.Translation: She worked so hard that she was even chosen as the representative of our school.

MESSAGE.JP: はもう、ふたり恋人同士として学校生活を過ごしていってもいいじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why wouldn't we be allowed to enjoy our student life together now?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why wouldn't we be allowed to enjoy our student life together now?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴はもう十分頑張った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've worked hard enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've worked hard enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう今のままでいいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you're fine as you are now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you're fine as you are now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから辞退しようよ。ふたりでずっと居よう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say no to them. Let's be together forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say no to them. Let's be together forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たうーみゅと考え始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She went into deep thought again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went into deep thought again.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹がそこまでいうならそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Since you insist so much, I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Since you insist so much, I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll quit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll quit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: った…願いが通じた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank God... She listened to my wishes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank God... She listened to my wishes.

MESSAGE.JP: っと呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured it quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured it quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 笑ましすぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was overwhelmed with joy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was overwhelmed with joy.

MESSAGE.JP: 笑ましすぎて、笑えてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: So much that I couldn't help but smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: So much that I couldn't help but smile.

MESSAGE.JP: うして僕は気づいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, it dawned on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, it dawned on me.

MESSAGE.JP: は未だに恋を知らない子供のまんまなんだと。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still a kid who didn't understand love.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still a kid who didn't understand love.

MESSAGE.JP: も今日まで、いろんなことを知ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had learned a lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had learned a lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 強してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had experienced so many things.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had experienced so many things.

MESSAGE.JP: れから先も、いろんなことを学んで…
MESSAGE.EN: And there were still so many new things for her to learn and experience...
MESSAGE.Translation: And there were still so many new things for her to learn and experience...

MESSAGE.JP: して恋も知っていくんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure she would come to understand love eventually.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure she would come to understand love eventually.

MESSAGE.JP: のために…
MESSAGE.EN: That's why...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why...

MESSAGE.JP: は行くべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: she had to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: she had to go.

MESSAGE.JP: に進むべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She needed to move forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: She needed to move forward.

MESSAGE.JP: の事実は、僕だけに矛盾している。
MESSAGE.EN: But this created a contradiction.
MESSAGE.Translation: But this created a contradiction.

MESSAGE.JP: が本当に恋をするためにも…鈴は行くべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She needs to go to really learn the meaning of love...
MESSAGE.Translation: She needs to go to really learn the meaning of love...

MESSAGE.JP: にいたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't want her to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't want her to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 緒にいたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I want her to be with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want her to be with me.

MESSAGE.JP: は本当に…鈴のことが好きだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because... I really do love her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because... I really do love her.

MESSAGE.JP: えたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: も、きっと今の鈴には伝わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: But as she is now, she wouldn't understand my feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: But as she is now, she wouldn't understand my feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: づけば、僕ひとりがわがままなだけだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that I was being selfish.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that I was being selfish.

MESSAGE.JP: と離れたくなかっただけなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I just didn't want her to be away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just didn't want her to be away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: はこの春から、一歩ずつ、成長している。
MESSAGE.EN: She had really grown since spring.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had really grown since spring.

MESSAGE.JP: に進んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was changing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was changing.

MESSAGE.JP: の春からは、見たことのない鈴の姿だらけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd witnessed sides of her I'd never seen before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd witnessed sides of her I'd never seen before.

MESSAGE.JP: らない人と話して打ち解けたり…
MESSAGE.EN: She had opened up to others...
MESSAGE.Translation: She had opened up to others...

MESSAGE.JP: 先して、問題に取り組んだり…
MESSAGE.EN: Even taking the initiative to solve their problems...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even taking the initiative to solve their problems...

MESSAGE.JP: り方は無茶だったり、見かけは無様だったりするけど…
MESSAGE.EN: She'd been clumsy about it, and the outcome wasn't always pretty, but nevertheless...
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd been clumsy about it, and the outcome wasn't always pretty, but nevertheless...

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、一歩ずつ着実に歩んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had come a long way.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had come a long way.

MESSAGE.JP: から、今回も進むべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why she must keep moving forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why she must keep moving forward.

MESSAGE.JP: は恋を知らない鈴だからこそ…
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't yet understand love...
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't yet understand love...

MESSAGE.JP: かせるべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to let her go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to let her go.

MESSAGE.JP: つか、本当に恋をするために…
MESSAGE.EN: So that one day she will really fall in love...
MESSAGE.Translation: So that one day she will really fall in love...

MESSAGE.JP: は僕のことを好きと言ってくれてるけど…
MESSAGE.EN: She said she likes me...
MESSAGE.Translation: She said she likes me...

MESSAGE.JP: の時、恋心を抱く相手は、僕じゃないかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: But when that time comes, it might be someone else she falls in love with.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when that time comes, it might be someone else she falls in love with.

MESSAGE.JP: が本当の恋をするのは別の男かもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be someone else, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be someone else, but...

MESSAGE.JP: れでも…
MESSAGE.EN: I hope...
MESSAGE.Translation: I hope...

MESSAGE.JP: の時も僕であることを願って…
MESSAGE.EN: that even when that time comes, I will still be the one...
MESSAGE.Translation: that even when that time comes, I will still be the one...

MESSAGE.JP: 中を押してやるべきなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I should encourage her to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should encourage her to go.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、僕は…
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe...

MESSAGE.JP: 恋するかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she will forget about me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she will forget about me.

MESSAGE.JP: から、こんなにも胸が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why my heart's in so much pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why my heart's in so much pain.

MESSAGE.JP: いながら…泣いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was smiling... but I felt like crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was smiling... but I felt like crying.

MESSAGE.JP: れを必死で隠した。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't want her to know.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't want her to know.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうした？　具合でも悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's wrong? Are you feeling sick?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's wrong? Are you feeling sick?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm alright...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm alright...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ね、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は行くべきだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん？　さっきと言ってることがちがう気がするのは気のせいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? Isn't that the opposite of what you said before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? Isn't that the opposite of what you said before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ヘンな奴だと思わないでほしいんだけど、気が変わったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please don't think I'm weird, but I changed my opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please don't think I'm weird, but I changed my opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もしかして…あたしのことが嫌いになったのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do you mean... you don't like me anymore...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you mean... you don't like me anymore...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなこと、あるわけない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way I'd come to dislike her.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way I'd come to dislike her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が伝えたいことは、その一言だけになったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This one thing is all I have to say to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This one thing is all I have to say to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は行くべきだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「恋人同士なのに、離ればなれになってしまうんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're going out. Are you okay with being separated?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're going out. Are you okay with being separated?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでもだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You still have to go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You still have to go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、そんなふたりになれる未来のために。

MESSAGE.JP: きな背中だ。

MESSAGE.Translation: His back was so large.

MESSAGE.JP: から大きかったけど…あんなごつごつしてなかった。

MESSAGE.Translation: I'll be outside for a while, so I'd better put on some warm clothes.

MESSAGE.EN: It didn't seem like the cat was moving toward any particular destination.

MESSAGE.EN: I was passing through the same place for the second time now, but I didn't stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was passing through the same place for the second time now, but I didn't stop.

MESSAGE.JP: は腹を据えて、どこまでもついて行こうと決めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I swore to follow the cat to the bitter end.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swore to follow the cat to the bitter end.

MESSAGE.EN: After meandering along for a while, the cat finally halted.
MESSAGE.Translation: After meandering along for a while, the cat finally halted.

MESSAGE.JP: さく、ふたつ鳴き、しばらく時が過ぎる。

MESSAGE.JP: ると、一匹の猫が音もなく走ってやってきた。

MESSAGE.JP: 明かりだけでもわかる白色。

MESSAGE.JP: ノンだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon licked the other cat's head as if in thanks for showing me the way.

MESSAGE.JP: すかに聞こえる喉を鳴らす音。

MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear a quiet purring from it.

MESSAGE.JP: れはひとしきり続き、やがて満足したのか足音もなく消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeming finally satisfied, it walked off without so much as making a sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeming finally satisfied, it walked off without so much as making a sound.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンはしばらく僕のことをじっと見つめていた。

MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon stared at me unflinchingly for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: を考えているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what was going through his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what was going through his head.

MESSAGE.JP: るで、僕を見定めしているように思え、僕も真剣な目で見つめ返してしまう。

MESSAGE.Translation: He kept staring at me intently, like he was gauging how serious I was. I met his gaze head on.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ時間が経っただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how much time passed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how much time passed.

MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down on a raised part of the wall and returned my gaze to Lennon.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンは相変わらず、僕のことを見ていた。

MESSAGE.Translation: He was still watching me.

MESSAGE.JP: 生の気配が消えると、僕はまた戻り、同じ場所に座り直した。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I went back to the place I'd been sitting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I went back to the place I'd been sitting.

MESSAGE.JP: びレノンと見つめ合うために。
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to continue my staring contest with Lennon...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to continue my staring contest with Lennon...

MESSAGE.JP: がそこにいたのは、恭介だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...but I found Kyousuke waiting there instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...but I found Kyousuke waiting there instead.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえは困った奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You sure are a handful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You sure are a handful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ノンを抱いて立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He held Lennon in his arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: He held Lennon in his arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「意固地なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm stubborn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm stubborn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「でも、答えを知るにはまだ早いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's too early for you to learn the answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's too early for you to learn the answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「早くなんてないよ、遅すぎたぐらいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もっと早く気づくべきだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should've realized from the beginning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should've realized from the beginning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱりすごいね、恭介は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really are amazing, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really are amazing, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんでもうまくやってのける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's nothing you can't do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's nothing you can't do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そんなことはないさ…俺だって失敗はする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's not true... Even I mess up sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's not true... Even I mess up sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それだって、筋書きには大して影響しない微々たるものでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But even when you do, things still go according to your scenario.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But even when you do, things still go according to your scenario.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「学食の問題なんて、どうやって予想したの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did you know the whole thing with the cafeteria would happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did you know the whole thing with the cafeteria would happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介はほんとに予知能力でも持ってる超能力者じゃないのかって思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sometimes I wonder if you can actually see the future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sometimes I wonder if you can actually see the future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「思い返せば、いつだってそんなふうだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's always been like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's always been like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介の言葉に、現実のほうが吸い寄せられていくんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's like you can somehow bend reality to your will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's like you can somehow bend reality to your will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「現実はそんな簡単にはいかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Reality isn't that simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Reality isn't that simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕にはそう見えるんだよ…恭介がどう感じてようが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's how it appears to me... I don't care what you think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's how it appears to me... I don't care what you think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ノンが恭介の手の中で眠たげにあくびをした。
MESSAGE.EN: Lennon yawned in his arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon yawned in his arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ理樹、おまえが解き明かした答えを聞かせてもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, did you figure out the answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, did you figure out the answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と僕は頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は、鈴を自分の庇護から離し、ずっと独り立ちさせたいと考えていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were trying to remove Rin from your constant care, to make her independent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were trying to remove Rin from your constant care, to make her independent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は就職してしまうし、それから先はこれまで通り守ってやれなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're going to get employed eventually, and won't be able to look after her forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're going to get employed eventually, and won't be able to look after her forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから鈴を自立させたかった。それは鈴のためにもいつかはするべきことだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you tried to make her self-sufficient. It was something you had to do one day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you tried to make her self-sufficient. It was something you had to do one day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そして、その機会は訪れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And then, a chance presented itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And then, a chance presented itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「校内で併設校との交換留学生の話が持ち上がる。恭介はそれに目ざとく便乗した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You heard about the student exchange program with the sister school, so you seized that opportunity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You heard about the student exchange program with the sister school, so you seized that opportunity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕たちから鈴ひとりを引き離し、自立させるには格好の舞台だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was the perfect chance to separate Rin from us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was the perfect chance to separate Rin from us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、それに選任されるように、レノンを使って、用意周到に状況を操ってきたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For that, you used Lennon to get her assigned to the role, carefully manipulating every detail of the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For that, you used Lennon to get her assigned to the role, carefully manipulating every detail of the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の眉が寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke furrowed his brows.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke furrowed his brows.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…そんなことが可能だと思うか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you really think something like that is possible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you really think something like that is possible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の知ってる恭介なら、やってみせるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If anyone could do it, it's you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If anyone could do it, it's you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうなの、今の答えは？　正解なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is my guess correct?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is my guess correct?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ご明察」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…といきたいところだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Or so I'd like to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Or so I'd like to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そもそも、おまえは問題をはき違えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that's not what I was asking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that's not what I was asking about.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺が解き明かしたかを訊いたのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What I asked you was whether you had figured out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What I asked you was whether you had figured out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「この世界の秘密だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...the secret of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...the secret of this world.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Wait...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait...

MESSAGE.JP: れは…
MESSAGE.EN: Now that I think of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now that I think of it...

MESSAGE.JP: 中まで僕と鈴が追っていたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the reason Rin and I got involved in the whole affair.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the reason Rin and I got involved in the whole affair.

MESSAGE.JP: 番最初に、レノンが運んできた手紙に記されていた、謎の言葉だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was written in the first letter Lennon brought.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was written in the first letter Lennon brought.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「冗談じゃない、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm being serious here, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm being serious here, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな問いに対する答えは、存在しない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no answer to that question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no answer to that question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もしあるとしたら、それは鈴の興味を引きつけるための餌でしかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if there were, wasn't that just bait to catch Rin's interest?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if there were, wasn't that just bait to catch Rin's interest?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は黙ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それとも何？　世界の秘密ってのは、哲学的な模索？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or what? Did you mean it in some philosophical way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or what? Did you mean it in some philosophical way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あるいは歴史の話？　さらに遡って宇宙がどうしてできたかとか科学の話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or perhaps historical? Or something scientific, like, how did the universe begin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or perhaps historical? Or something scientific, like, how did the universe begin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思いつく限りの連想されうる言葉を口にしてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was just saying whatever came into my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was just saying whatever came into my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: のどれにも恭介は反応しない。
MESSAGE.EN: But Kyousuke didn't say a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Kyousuke didn't say a word.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく無言が続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He remained silent for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: He remained silent for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: が、その恭介の沈黙が突然破れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then suddenly...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then suddenly...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「はっはっはっは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hahahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hahahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: い始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He laughed.
MESSAGE.Translation: He laughed.

MESSAGE.JP: がこぼれんばかりの大笑いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He laughed till tears welled up in his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: He laughed till tears welled up in his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: は呆気にとられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was dumbstruck.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was dumbstruck.

MESSAGE.JP: 介の感情がどうしてそこに至ったのかが、さっぱりわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't begin to imagine what was going through his mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't begin to imagine what was going through his mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「誰だ、そこにいるのは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Who's there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Who's there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の馬鹿笑いはこの夜更けには通りすぎる。見回りの教師が聞きつけて、戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: His roaring laughter filled the night air and caught the patrolling teacher's attention.
MESSAGE.Translation: His roaring laughter filled the night air and caught the patrolling teacher's attention.

MESSAGE.JP: るいは、それが狙いだったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe that was what he had in mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe that was what he had in mind.

MESSAGE.JP: としたら、僕は頭が悪すぎたし、恭介は計算高すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I was too naive and had underestimated how calculating he could be.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I was too naive and had underestimated how calculating he could be.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっと、まずいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oops, this is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oops, this is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の腕を引っ張ると、恭介は走り始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He seized my arm and started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seized my arm and started running.

MESSAGE.JP: が絡まり、手がほどける。
MESSAGE.EN: My legs got tangled up and I let go of his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: My legs got tangled up and I let go of his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ずい、ついていかなきゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't afford to lose him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't afford to lose him.

MESSAGE.JP: も、体勢を立て直した時にはもう、恭介の姿は確認できなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But when I got up, he was already nowhere to be seen.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when I got up, he was already nowhere to be seen.

MESSAGE.JP: の暗闇の中、二度と見つけることはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dark and I failed to find him.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dark and I failed to find him.

MESSAGE.JP: 日。
MESSAGE.EN: On the following day.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the following day.

MESSAGE.JP: は猫の群衆の中で、紙切れをじっと見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was eyeing a piece of paper, surrounded by a horde of cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was eyeing a piece of paper, surrounded by a horde of cats.

MESSAGE.JP: が寄っていくと、こちらに気付いて、口を開こうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her mouth as soon as she noticed me, but I cut her off before she could speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her mouth as soon as she noticed me, but I cut her off before she could speak.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最後の課題でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's the last task, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's the last task, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が先にそう言ったので、鈴は驚きのあまり飛び跳ねる。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped from surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped from surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もしかして、おまえが書いていたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Was it you that wrote it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Was it you that wrote it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、内容は知らないんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So you don't know what's written here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So you don't know what's written here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「想像はつくけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can imagine what it says.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can imagine what it says.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんとだ…併設校を救え、だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It says... Save the sister school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It says... Save the sister school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こいつ、よく知ってるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why does this guy know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why does this guy know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも、この課題は簡単に達成できないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But this task can't be solved that simply.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But this task can't be solved that simply.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まだ考えている途中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I still haven't made up my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I still haven't made up my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「さて、どうしたものか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よし、やめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, I'm not going anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, I'm not going anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんでそんなに驚く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why are you so surprised?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why are you so surprised?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大事なことなのに一瞬で決めるからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't make an important decision like that so quickly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't make an important decision like that so quickly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一瞬なんかじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I took long enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I took long enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「これでも一生懸命考えたんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've really thought it through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've really thought it through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「昨日からずっとだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I've been thinking since yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I've been thinking since yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って僕を覗き込む鈴の顔は、確かに寝不足で疲れているように見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her face closely, it didn't seem like she had gotten any sleep last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her face closely, it didn't seem like she had gotten any sleep last night.

MESSAGE.JP: の一生懸命に考え込む姿なんて想像もつかないけど…それでもやっぱり今の鈴ならそうしたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hard to imagine her thinking seriously about anything, but the way she was now, it wasn't impossible.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hard to imagine her thinking seriously about anything, but the way she was now, it wasn't impossible.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「先生にやめるって言ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll go tell the teacher I'm not going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll go tell the teacher I'm not going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, hold it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, hold it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だめなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もっと、よく、考えようっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should give it some more thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should give it some more thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い聞かせる。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her.

MESSAGE.JP: い聞かせた後…僕は妙に思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea why I said this...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea why I said this...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…なんで僕がこんなに必死に止めてるんだろう）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Why do I have to push her to go?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Why do I have to push her to go?)

MESSAGE.JP: が止めさえしなければ、鈴と一緒に過ごしていけるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: If I don't say anything, she will stay with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I don't say anything, she will stay with me.

MESSAGE.JP: れは僕の願いだったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Wasn't that exactly what I wanted?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wasn't that exactly what I wanted?

MESSAGE.JP: のに、僕は止めている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Then why was I trying to stop her...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then why was I trying to stop her...

MESSAGE.JP: これじゃまるで、僕のこの行動さえも、恭介の計算のうちに入ってるようじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's like Kyousuke already knew it would turn out like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's like Kyousuke already knew it would turn out like this.

MESSAGE.JP: うじゃない…
MESSAGE.EN: And I'm not just being paranoid...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I'm not just being paranoid...

MESSAGE.JP: 入っているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I really think he did...
MESSAGE.Translation: I really think he did...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もっと…考えるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Should I... give it some more thought?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Should I... give it some more thought?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーみゅ…と悩み始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She thought for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thought for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「考えるほどにいやになるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The more I think, the less I like the idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The more I think, the less I like the idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No wonder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No wonder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だって、知らない人ばかりのところにいくんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I mean, I don't know anyone over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I mean, I don't know anyone over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「これはむちゃくちゃいやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I super duper don't want to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I super duper don't want to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、もーくちゃくちゃいやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I duper duper don't want to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I duper duper don't want to go.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, Kyousuke, that idiot or that other idiot; none of you will be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, Kyousuke, that idiot or that other idiot; none of you will be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹も恭介も謙吾も馬鹿もいないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, Kyousuke, Kengo or that idiot; none of you will be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, Kyousuke, Kengo or that idiot; none of you will be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「誰と話せばいいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Who should I talk to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Who should I talk to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…新しい友達とだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... your new friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... your new friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だれのことだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Like who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Like who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは向こうにいってから作るんだよ、鈴が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should make new friends over there, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should make new friends over there, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここで作ったようにさ…できるよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You made new friends in this school... I'm certain you can do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You made new friends in this school... I'm certain you can do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと。
MESSAGE.EN: I was certain of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was certain of it.

MESSAGE.JP: れは本当に望みが薄い“きっと”だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it really was a thin certainty.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it really was a thin certainty.

MESSAGE.JP: しいクラスメイトは…心を痛めている人たちばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She'll be in a new class... And her classmates have been hurt mentally.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'll be in a new class... And her classmates have been hurt mentally.

MESSAGE.JP: んな中に、ひとり放り込まれて…鈴に一体何ができるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She'll be all by herself... Will there be anything she can do?
MESSAGE.Translation: She'll be all by herself... Will there be anything she can do?

MESSAGE.JP: はそこまで頭が回っていないはずなのに、僕はそんな不安さえ、鈴に教えずにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't have an inkling what was in store for her, yet I didn't tell her about my fears.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't have an inkling what was in store for her, yet I didn't tell her about my fears.

MESSAGE.JP: 向きに考えてもらえるように。
MESSAGE.EN: I was trying to cheer her on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was trying to cheer her on.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それは…理樹や恭介が一緒だったからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's because... you and Kyousuke were with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's because... you and Kyousuke were with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だとしても、頑張ればいい。それだけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even so, you just need to try your best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even so, you just need to try your best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだっ？　おまえ、ほんとにあたしの彼氏かっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's with that? Do you really call yourself my boyfriend!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's with that? Do you really call yourself my boyfriend!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が引く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was shocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was shocked.

MESSAGE.JP: らの思いは今、まったく交わっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: We were still not on the same wavelength.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were still not on the same wavelength.

MESSAGE.JP: が託したい思いはまったく伝わっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't understand what I was trying to tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't understand what I was trying to tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、今のふたりが、形だけの恋人だという証でもある。
MESSAGE.EN: It further proved that we were boyfriend and girlfriend in name only.
MESSAGE.Translation: It further proved that we were boyfriend and girlfriend in name only.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹は…このまま別れたいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki... Do you want to break up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki... Do you want to break up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別れたくなんかない…矛盾してるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't, but... it's complicated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't, but... it's complicated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は鈴のことが好きなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大好きなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは僕の…
MESSAGE.EN: It was...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was...

MESSAGE.JP: めての告白だった。
MESSAGE.EN: the first time I said that to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: the first time I said that to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なのに、遠くにいって、友達を作れというのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But you still want me to go somewhere far away and make new friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But you still want me to go somewhere far away and make new friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえの神経、奇っ怪すぎるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't get you at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't get you at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴がシンプルすぎるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're just too simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're just too simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「向こうで、かっこいい男の子と友達になってやるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What if I make friends with some cool guy over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What if I make friends with some cool guy over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「できたら、それはいいことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'd be great if you did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'd be great if you did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当にそう思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I really thought so.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really thought so.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごくいいことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'd be wonderful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'd be wonderful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: So I repeated it.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I repeated it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「馬鹿にしてるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're making fun of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're making fun of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「してないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「してる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うぅぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふかーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえの彼女は今、大変お怒りだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your girlfriend is now infuriated with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your girlfriend is now infuriated with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「説明されなくてもよくわかるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I can tell...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I can tell...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「今、先生が前にいたら、行きます、と言ってしまいそうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If the teacher was here now, I'd likely tell him ❛Okay, I'll go❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If the teacher was here now, I'd likely tell him ❛Okay, I'll go❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: るほど。
MESSAGE.EN: I got it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got it.

MESSAGE.JP: 自身が今、すごいヒントをくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She just gave me a good tip.
MESSAGE.Translation: She just gave me a good tip.

MESSAGE.JP: 氏である僕が冷たくあたり続ければ、いいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to keep treating her harshly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to keep treating her harshly.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、鈴は怒りに任せて、行ってしまうんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she'll lose her temper and end up going.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she'll lose her temper and end up going.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、結局、鈴は僕とは別れられないんだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You won't break up with me, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You won't break up with me, though.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほかに選択肢がないんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have no other choice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have no other choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その臆病な性格のおかげで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, you're a coward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, you're a coward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said it.

MESSAGE.JP: の中で何かが切れたのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell something inside her flipped.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell something inside her flipped.

MESSAGE.JP: ごく、伝わってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was obvious.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was obvious.

MESSAGE.JP: は、まだ何も隠せない子だから。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't hide her emotions.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't hide her emotions.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹なんか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「えんがちょじゃ、ぼけー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You stupid nincompoop!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You stupid nincompoop!❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちがびっくりして退散を始めるほどの大声をあげて…
MESSAGE.EN: She yelled so loud that cats started running away terrified...
MESSAGE.Translation: She yelled so loud that cats started running away terrified...

MESSAGE.JP: は走り去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she sprinted off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she sprinted off.

MESSAGE.JP: り散りになった猫たちが鈴の背中を目で追っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The puzzled cats followed her with their eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The puzzled cats followed her with their eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: は、そんなみんなに謝る。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to apologize to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to apologize to them.

MESSAGE.JP: めん、と。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「結局、すべてが恭介の筋書き通りだったと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So what you're saying is that this was all planned by Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So what you're saying is that this was all planned by Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そう言いたいのか、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: になって、僕は謙吾を外に呼び出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I called Kengo over that night.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called Kengo over that night.

MESSAGE.JP: 人はこの件については口を挟まないと言ってたし、恭介はむしろ行かせたいという立場だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato said he doesn't want to speak about the whole thing, and Kyousuke wants Rin to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato said he doesn't want to speak about the whole thing, and Kyousuke wants Rin to go.

MESSAGE.JP: はや僕の愚痴を聞いてくれるのは謙吾ひとりしかいなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo is the only one I can consult about this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo is the only one I can consult about this.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介のことを悪いように言いたいわけじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm blaming Kyousuke or anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I'm blaming Kyousuke or anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今更だからね。恭介のそういうやり方は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, he's always been this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, he's always been this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やったことも正しいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I don't think he's done anything wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I don't think he's done anything wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、今回ばかりは、気にくわないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it just rubs me the wrong way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it just rubs me the wrong way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「鈴を独り立ちさせるがために、おまえの、その恋心まで利用されたことがか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You don't like how he used your feelings in order to make Rin independent?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You don't like how he used your feelings in order to make Rin independent?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、そのうちのひとつでしかないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's one of the reasons.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's one of the reasons.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が許せないのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But the one thing I can't forgive him for...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But the one thing I can't forgive him for...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「解散させるために、リトルバスターズをもう一度作ったことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...is how he started up the Little Busters again, only to have it break up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...is how he started up the Little Busters again, only to have it break up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介が就職活動から帰ってきた翌日、連休明けの月曜」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That morning, the day after he got back from job hunting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That morning, the day after he got back from job hunting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「薄汚れたボールを拾って、リトルバスターズというチームを作ろうって言ってくれたとき…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He picked up a dirty ball and said he wanted to make up a team, the Little Busters...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He picked up a dirty ball and said he wanted to make up a team, the Little Busters...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、すごく嬉しかったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was so happy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was so happy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はずっと、こんな楽しい時間が続けばいいって願い続けていたから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We had so much fun, I prayed things would never change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We had so much fun, I prayed things would never change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介だけは…僕と同じ気持ちでいてくれたんだって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought only Kyousuke knew how I felt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought only Kyousuke knew how I felt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「通じ合えていた気がして、すごく幸せを感じたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought he understood me and that made me happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought he understood me and that made me happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、その時、恭介の本当の気持ちは違っていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But that's not what was on his mind at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But that's not what was on his mind at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そこから、始まっていたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was when he set his plan into motion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was when he set his plan into motion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴を送り出して…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The plan to send Rin away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The plan to send Rin away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「リトルバスターズを終わらせるための計画が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...and put an end to the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...and put an end to the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それとも、これは恭介なりの、説教なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Or maybe he was trying to teach us a lesson.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Or maybe he was trying to teach us a lesson.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いつまでもリトルバスターズじゃ…子供のままじゃいられないっていうさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That the Little Busters won't be around forever... That we need to grow up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That the Little Busters won't be around forever... That we need to grow up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「リトルバスターズって、なんなのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is the Little Busters anyway...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is the Little Busters anyway...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹はなんだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you think it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you think it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「友情の…証」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A symbol... of friendship.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A symbol... of friendship.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうだな。俺も、そう思っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I agree with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I agree with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾のその同意は、意外でもあり、嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was surprised and happy to hear him agree with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was surprised and happy to hear him agree with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それを誰にも相談しないで、勝手に終わらせるなんて、ひどすぎるじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's cruel how he wants to put an end to it without talking to anyone about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's cruel how he wants to put an end to it without talking to anyone about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺は、もし、鈴がいなくなったとしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even if Rin goes away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even if Rin goes away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「リトルバスターズが終わるとは思っていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The Little Busters will still exist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The Little Busters will still exist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もし誰もいなくなったとしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even if no one else is left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even if no one else is left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺がひとりで続けてやる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll be there to carry it on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll be there to carry it on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻ると、真人がひとりで段ボール箱に向かっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I got back to my room, Masato was sitting beside the cardboard box.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I got back to my room, Masato was sitting beside the cardboard box.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何してんの？　落書き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing? Doodling?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing? Doodling?❞

MESSAGE.JP: き込むと、教科書とノートを開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I peered over his shoulder and saw he had his textbook open before him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I peered over his shoulder and saw he had his textbook open before him.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「宿題だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Homework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Homework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、どうしてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今日はさ…オレがおまえに写させてやろうと思ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just thought... I'd let you copy my homework today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just thought... I'd let you copy my homework today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、自分でするけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can do it by myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can do it by myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　できるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What? Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What? Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、いつもやってるじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've been doing that every day so far...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've been doing that every day so far...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「でも、今日はその…そういう気分じゃないだろ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But... You don't feel like doing homework today, right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But... You don't feel like doing homework today, right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どんな気分でも宿題ぐらいするけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My feelings have nothing to do with that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My feelings have nothing to do with that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんな、遠慮すんなって」

MESSAGE.EN: I ignored him and walked past him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ignored him and walked past him.

MESSAGE.JP: 、腕をつかまれ、止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: But he grabbed my hand and stopped me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he grabbed my hand and stopped me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで止めるんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you stopping me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you stopping me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「無理だ。おまえは鈴の居る場所にはたどり着けない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You won't be able to go where she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You won't be able to go where she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「調べればなんとかなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can figure out the place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can figure out the place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は思いきり、腕を振った。
