MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to shake his hand off with all my might.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、恭介の手はきつく締まって僕の二の腕から離れない。
MESSAGE.EN: But he kept his grip firm.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he kept his grip firm.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、恭介が力ずくで邪魔をする、という意味じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: So he's going to stop me by force.
MESSAGE.Translation: So he's going to stop me by force.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はその手を掴み返す。力の限り。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed his wrist in return as tight as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed his wrist in return as tight as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴が今…どうなってるのか…知ってるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you know... how Rin feels...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you know... how Rin feels...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は…泣いてるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's... crying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's... crying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとりきりで…泣いてるんだぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's crying... all alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's crying... all alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今も、ひとり遠い場所で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's far away, all by herself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's far away, all by herself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴が泣いてるところなんて…恭介でさえ…知らないんじゃないのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you... have never seen her crying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure even you... have never seen her crying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I haven't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I haven't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…あいつは泣かなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...She never cried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...She never cried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だが、それは俺がいつも守っていたからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But that's because she's always been under my care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But that's because she's always been under my care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、今回も助けてやろうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then help her one more time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then help her one more time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それじゃあ意味がない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then there would be no meaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then there would be no meaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「意味がないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No meaning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No meaning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそもこんな乱暴なやり方じゃ、どんな意味もなさないよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the point in doing it in such a forceful way!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the point in doing it in such a forceful way!❞

MESSAGE.JP: は声を荒げていた。寮内のみんなに聞こえてしまうぐらいの大声で。
MESSAGE.EN: I said it in such a loud voice everyone in the dorm must've heard me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said it in such a loud voice everyone in the dorm must've heard me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もっと大事なものまでなくしてしまうかもしれないじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're on the verge of losing something way more important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're on the verge of losing something way more important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕たちが今日まで育んできたもの…大事なものたくさん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All these things we've done together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All these things we've done together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は、ぜんぶ壊してしまいたいの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do they mean nothing to you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do they mean nothing to you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は守る…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will help her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will help her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとりになっても、守り続ける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if no else does, I will always help her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if no else does, I will always help her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、鈴を迎えにいく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why I'll go to her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why I'll go to her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の手の力が弛む。
MESSAGE.EN: His grip loosened.
MESSAGE.Translation: His grip loosened.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「後三日頑張れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just bear with it for three days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just bear with it for three days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も合わせず恭介は言った。
MESSAGE.EN: He couldn't look me straight in the face when he answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: He couldn't look me straight in the face when he answered.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の横顔は無表情のままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: His expression was unreadable.
MESSAGE.Translation: His expression was unreadable.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「次の土曜には戻ってこれるようにする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll make it so she can come back next Saturday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll make it so she can come back next Saturday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だから、今週はなんとか…死にものぐるいでいい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just till the weekend... Stick it out until then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just till the weekend... Stick it out until then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「乗り越えてみせてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Show me that you can overcome this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Show me that you can overcome this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それじゃ…ダメか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well... what's your answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well... what's your answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は何も答えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 介は無言の返事と受け取ったのだろう、手を離し、先を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He let go of my hand and walked away as though interpreting my silence as approval.
MESSAGE.Translation: He let go of my hand and walked away as though interpreting my silence as approval.

MESSAGE.JP: は考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I analyzed the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I analyzed the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: れまで頑なだった恭介が譲歩した。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite being uncompromising so far, he had given in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite being uncompromising so far, he had given in.

MESSAGE.JP: もその譲歩の内容は、恭介の独断で決められるものなのか、疑問だった。
MESSAGE.EN: But the fact that he could simply decide this on his own seemed strange to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the fact that he could simply decide this on his own seemed strange to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 介ならなんとかしてしまうんだろうな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure he'll be able to get things done...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure he'll be able to get things done...

MESSAGE.JP: にはきっとできない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not something I can do.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not something I can do.

MESSAGE.JP: も、恭介の手から逃れた今なら、鈴の居る学校にも辿り着ける。
MESSAGE.EN: But as I'm no longer dependent on him either, I can go to Rin's school.
MESSAGE.Translation: But as I'm no longer dependent on him either, I can go to Rin's school.

MESSAGE.JP: そう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should look for it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should look for it...

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻り、新学期に配られた連絡表を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to my room to search for the pamphlet I had received at the beginning of the new school year.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to my room to search for the pamphlet I had received at the beginning of the new school year.

MESSAGE.JP: かここに担任の自宅の電話番号があったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Our teacher's home number was supposed to be written there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our teacher's home number was supposed to be written there.

MESSAGE.JP: やる気持ちを抑え、携帯の番号を入力する。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to try his cellphone number first, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to try his cellphone number first, though.

MESSAGE.JP: るるる…、ぷるるる…。
MESSAGE.EN: *Ring*ring*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ring*ring*...

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『もしもし』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[Hello.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[Hello.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夜分すみません、直枝です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry to call so late, it's Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry to call so late, it's Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『おお、どうしたんだ？　こんな時間に』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[Oh, what happened? Something urgent?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[Oh, what happened? Something urgent?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴…えっと、棗さんの転入先なんですけど、場所はご存知ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@[Rin... Uh, I mean Natsume-san, do you know where she transferred?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@[Rin... Uh, I mean Natsume-san, do you know where she transferred?]

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『いや、僕は知らないな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[No, no idea.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[No, no idea.]

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『ところで、どうしてそんなこと訊くんだ？　棗に訊けばいいじゃないか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[Why are you asking me? Why don't you ask Natsume directly?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[Why are you asking me? Why don't you ask Natsume directly?]

MESSAGE.JP: っさに言葉に詰まった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know how to reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know how to reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええと、携帯の電波が繋がらないみたいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Umm, it seems that her cellphone has poor reception.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Umm, it seems that her cellphone has poor reception.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「メールで大変だって聞いたから、今度の休みにでも元気づけに行こうかと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She said she was going through a rough time in the email I got, so I wanted to go check up on her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She said she was going through a rough time in the email I got, so I wanted to go check up on her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『そうか。でも、僕は転入の手続きとか何も知らないからな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[I see. But I don't know anything about the transfer paperwork.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[I see. But I don't know anything about the transfer paperwork.]

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『事務局に聞けばわかるかもしれないから、明日聞いてみたらどうだ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[You should try asking someone in the school office, why don't you go there tomorrow?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[You should try asking someone in the school office, why don't you go there tomorrow?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ええ、そうですね。わかりました、おやすみなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay. Thanks for your help. Good night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay. Thanks for your help. Good night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 担任@『お休み』
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@[Good night.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@[Good night.]

MESSAGE.JP: 話を切る。
MESSAGE.EN: I hung up the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hung up the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: あ言ったけど、それじゃ遅すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: I said it like he had solved my problem, but tomorrow was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said it like he had solved my problem, but tomorrow was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: は今、泣いているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was crying now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was crying now.

MESSAGE.JP: 校の事務局に電話した。
MESSAGE.EN: I called our school office.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called our school office.

MESSAGE.JP: の時間まで誰かが居るとは思えなかったけど、電話せずにはいられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't expect anyone to be around, but I had to give it a shot.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't expect anyone to be around, but I had to give it a shot.

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『はい、事務局』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[Hello.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[Hello.]

MESSAGE.JP: がった！
MESSAGE.EN: Someone picked up the phone!
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone picked up the phone!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、すみません。２年Ｅ組の直枝です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse me, I'm Naoe from class 2-E.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse me, I'm Naoe from class 2-E.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『どうしたの？　こんな夜中に』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[What's the matter? It's almost midnight.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[What's the matter? It's almost midnight.]

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『たまたま残業してたから出たけど』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[I happened to be working overtime so I answered the call.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[I happened to be working overtime so I answered the call.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すみません、急いでるんですが、２年Ｅ組の棗さんの転入先ってわかりますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but this is very important. Do you know where Natsume-san from class 2-E transferred to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but this is very important. Do you know where Natsume-san from class 2-E transferred to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「併設校って聞いてるんですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard it's a sister school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard it's a sister school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『ごめんなさいね、こちらでは規則で教えられないの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[I'm sorry, but I'm not supposed to disclose that information.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[I'm sorry, but I'm not supposed to disclose that information.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なぜですか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『ちょっと落ち着いてよ。どうしたの？　すごい剣幕ね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[Calm down. What's wrong? No need to talk in that tone.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[Calm down. What's wrong? No need to talk in that tone.]

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴の状況を必死に説明した。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained what Rin was going through.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained what Rin was going through.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…だから、そこに行って元気づけてあげたいんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's why I really need to go see how she's doing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's why I really need to go see how she's doing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『それはわかるけど…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[Well, I can understand that...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[Well, I can understand that...]

MESSAGE.JP: 事務員@『でも、規則は規則だから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@[But rules are rules.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@[But rules are rules.]

MESSAGE.JP: とはどれだけ食い下がっても無駄だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed her to no avail.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed her to no avail.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでこんなことさえも教えてもらえないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why won't they tell me?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why won't they tell me?

MESSAGE.JP: るで、あらゆるところに恭介の手が行き届いているようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's like Kyousuke had made sure it'd be like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's like Kyousuke had made sure it'd be like this...

MESSAGE.JP: 介なんてただの学生でしかないのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is he really just a student...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is he really just a student...?

MESSAGE.JP: 回しできることにも、いくらなんだって、限度がある…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if he did work behind the scenes, there's only so much he could've done...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if he did work behind the scenes, there's only so much he could've done...

MESSAGE.JP: も、予言していたじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But he knew...
MESSAGE.Translation: But he knew...

MESSAGE.JP: のいる場所には辿り着けないって。
MESSAGE.EN: He said I wouldn't be able to go to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: He said I wouldn't be able to go to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンの予見と同じように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like he had predicted everything with Lennon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like he had predicted everything with Lennon.

MESSAGE.JP: れからしばらく時間が経っている。
MESSAGE.EN: After a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a while.

MESSAGE.JP: が今どんな気持ちでいるか、確かめるために、もう一度電話をかけてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I dialed Rin's number one more time to ask how she was doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dialed Rin's number one more time to ask how she was doing.

MESSAGE.JP: 度も出てくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: も、その後すぐにメールが届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: But she texted me with:
MESSAGE.Translation: But she texted me with:

MESSAGE.JP: すこしおちついた(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [I calmed down a bit (-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I calmed down a bit (-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: も少し安心した。
MESSAGE.EN: I was slightly reassured.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was slightly reassured.

MESSAGE.JP: は迷った後…恭介の提案を伝えてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: After some deliberation, I told her about Kyousuke's plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: After some deliberation, I told her about Kyousuke's plan.

MESSAGE.JP: う少しだけ頑張ってみないか、と。
MESSAGE.EN: And asked her if she could wait for a little longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: And asked her if she could wait for a little longer.

MESSAGE.JP: は本当か？と驚いたように訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was surprised and asked if it was true.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was surprised and asked if it was true.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当。』
MESSAGE.EN: [Yes.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Yes.]

MESSAGE.JP: 信もないのに、そう答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't really sure, but I still said yes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't really sure, but I still said yes.

MESSAGE.JP: 三日だけだな？と鈴は念を押してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just three days, right? She wanted to make sure.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just three days, right? She wanted to make sure.

MESSAGE.JP: は、そうだと返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with ❛Yes.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with ❛Yes.❜

MESSAGE.JP: し待った。
MESSAGE.EN: After some time:
MESSAGE.Translation: After some time:

MESSAGE.JP: ならもうすこしだけがんばってみる(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Then I'll be waiting (-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Then I'll be waiting (-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: う返事が戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how she replied.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how she replied.

MESSAGE.JP: 張れ。それはなんて無責任な言葉だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's so easy to say ❛Hang in there.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It's so easy to say ❛Hang in there.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 手を縛りつけるだけで、自分はどんな責任も負わない。
MESSAGE.EN: You just push everything on the other person and get absolved of all responsibility.
MESSAGE.Translation: You just push everything on the other person and get absolved of all responsibility.

MESSAGE.JP: んて簡単な言葉なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's so simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's so simple.

MESSAGE.JP: にできることは、それを繰り返すことだけなのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was the only thing I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was the only thing I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介の力を借りず、鈴をこの土日に戻れるように手配することすらできない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't even make it so she could come back for the weekend without Kyousuke's help.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't even make it so she could come back for the weekend without Kyousuke's help.

MESSAGE.JP: らせめて…
MESSAGE.EN: But still...
MESSAGE.Translation: But still...

MESSAGE.JP: 負して、それを勝ち取ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I can beat him in the game.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can beat him in the game.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「９回裏一点差、ツーアウト、ランナー満塁だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Bottom of the ninth, two outs, bases loaded.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Bottom of the ninth, two outs, bases loaded.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、オーケー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 野の守備位置は深い。
MESSAGE.EN: The in-field defense was strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: The in-field defense was strong.

MESSAGE.JP: ンナーが詰まっているから、タッチプレイの必要はない。どこに投げてもフォースプレイでアウトが取れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Since there were three runners on, there was no need to tag them up; they'd be forced out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since there were three runners on, there was no need to tag them up; they'd be forced out.

MESSAGE.JP: いつめているように見えるが、実際追いつめられているのはバッターの僕のほうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like we had an advantage, but actually I was in quite a predicament as the batter.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like we had an advantage, but actually I was in quite a predicament as the batter.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、あの内野を越えさえすればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I just had to hit the ball to the outfield.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just had to hit the ball to the outfield.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You don't often get a chance like this, so you should feel lucky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You don't often get a chance like this, so you should feel lucky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の体を梳（くしけず）っているうちに、猫にふれて気が緩んだのか鈴の呟きが漏れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin loosened up while grooming her cat and started muttering under her breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin loosened up while grooming her cat and started muttering under her breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「にゃーにゃー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nyaa nyaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nyaa nyaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーにゃー言ったのは鈴だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was meowing too.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was meowing too.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃ？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、不満か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh, not good enough for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh, not good enough for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: したし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Prod*prod*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Prod*prod*.

MESSAGE.JP: の足が鈴の靴を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat pawed Rin's leg.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat pawed Rin's leg.

MESSAGE.JP: ょい、と鈴のひざに足を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Then it suddenly put its leg on Rin's knee.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then it suddenly put its leg on Rin's knee.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーお。
MESSAGE.EN: Meeow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meeow.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひゃっ…な、なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hyaa... Wh-what's up with you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hyaa... Wh-what's up with you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「く、くすぐった…舐めるなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I-it's ticklish... Don't lick me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I-it's ticklish... Don't lick me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ざらざらだろっ…ひゃふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It feels like sandpaper... Hyaafu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It feels like sandpaper... Hyaafu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くすぐたっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's ticklish!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's ticklish!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーにゃーみゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「な、なにぃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wh-what!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wh-what!❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは次々と鈴のひざに自分の足をかけては背伸びし始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: One after another, cats lifted their front legs on her knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: One after another, cats lifted their front legs on her knees.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Waah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Waah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 餅をついた鈴はあっという間に猫に覆われる。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell down on her back and before long was completely covered by a swarm of cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell down on her back and before long was completely covered by a swarm of cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こ、こら、なんだ…や、やめっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝H-hey... Stop that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝H-hey... Stop that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちてち。
MESSAGE.EN: *Lick*lick*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Lick*lick*.

MESSAGE.JP: たちの舌が鈴の頬を舐める音。
MESSAGE.EN: They licked all over her cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: They licked all over her cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くすぐったいって言ってるだろっ　こら！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm telling you, it tickles!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm telling you, it tickles!❞

MESSAGE.JP: を引きはがしても、その猫はまた戻ってきてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She tried to shoo the cats from her, but they just kept coming back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried to shoo the cats from her, but they just kept coming back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あははっくすぐっ…ほんと、やっ、やめっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ahaha, it tickles... C-cut it out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ahaha, it tickles... C-cut it out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ひゃっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hyaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hyaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やめろぼけぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Stop it, you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Stop it, you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: つか聞いた優しい罵り声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice always had this kindness when she scolded her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice always had this kindness when she scolded her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…聞き分けよくしてないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Listen to what I say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Listen to what I say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Bad!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Bad!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー…。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow...
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の群れを見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked over the herd of cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked over the herd of cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 堵とも満足ともつかぬ息を漏らした鈴は、笑顔を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: And with a sigh of relief and satisfaction, her face lit up in a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: And with a sigh of relief and satisfaction, her face lit up in a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おいで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 匹を呼び寄せると、ぎゅーと抱く。
MESSAGE.EN: She called one of the cats and embraced it warmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called one of the cats and embraced it warmly.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「昼寝のしすぎだろ…毛皮、あっついぞ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You sleep too much in the afternoon... Just look at your fur!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You sleep too much in the afternoon... Just look at your fur!❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃうにゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat meowed softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat meowed softly.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…うにゃうにゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Unyaunya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Unyaunya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の鳴き声の真似を無邪気に鈴は繰り返していた。
MESSAGE.EN: She imitated the cat in the most innocent of voices.
MESSAGE.Translation: She imitated the cat in the most innocent of voices.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、僕はそんな彼女を見守っているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, I only had to look at her from afar.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, I only had to look at her from afar.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…いるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Are you there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Are you there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: たま鈴は僕のほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Every now and then she would look back at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every now and then she would look back at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もちろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は安心する。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with relief.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いなくなったら、ダメだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't leave me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't leave me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫。ずっといるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay, I'm not going anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay, I'm not going anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はもう、ひとりになることに怯えてしまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was afraid of being left alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was afraid of being left alone.

MESSAGE.JP: して、僕以外を信用しなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't trust anyone except me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't trust anyone except me.

MESSAGE.JP: れはたった一週間の出来事だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the result of just one week.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the result of just one week.

MESSAGE.JP: こうの学校にいる間、鈴から何度か、みんなにメールを出したり、電話をかけたりしてみたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard that she had tried phoning everyone when she was in the other school, but with no luck.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard that she had tried phoning everyone when she was in the other school, but with no luck.

MESSAGE.JP: も、誰も出てくれなかったし、メールも返ってこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: No one picked up the phone or sent a reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one picked up the phone or sent a reply.

MESSAGE.JP: だけが、鈴と繋がっていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Only I kept in touch with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only I kept in touch with her.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、恭介からの指示なのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Had it been Kyousuke's work too?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had it been Kyousuke's work too?

MESSAGE.JP: は窓のほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 頃、いつものようにみんなは野球に興じているのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if everyone was playing baseball like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if everyone was playing baseball like always.

MESSAGE.JP: んなも、恭介側なのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Were all of them on Kyousuke's side?
MESSAGE.Translation: Were all of them on Kyousuke's side?

MESSAGE.JP: んなにまでして、やることなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What were they trying to accomplish?
MESSAGE.Translation: What were they trying to accomplish?

MESSAGE.JP: 解しがたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't fathom it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't fathom it.

MESSAGE.JP: たりを感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt so distant from them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt so distant from them.

MESSAGE.JP: つの間にか、もう…
MESSAGE.EN: Since when did...
MESSAGE.Translation: Since when did...

MESSAGE.JP: トルバスターズは僕たちの居場所じゃなくなっている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...the Little Busters stop being the place for us to be?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...the Little Busters stop being the place for us to be?

MESSAGE.JP: れ以上の過酷を鈴に強いるというのなら…
MESSAGE.EN: If they keep treating Rin this cruelly...
MESSAGE.Translation: If they keep treating Rin this cruelly...

MESSAGE.JP: はひとりきりでも、鈴を守るべきなんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I will have to protect her, even if by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will have to protect her, even if by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: を連れて…遠くへ逃げてしまえばいいんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should take her with me... and run someplace far, far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should take her with me... and run someplace far, far away.

MESSAGE.JP: んな思いに駆られる。
MESSAGE.EN: The thought suddenly occurred to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thought suddenly occurred to me.

MESSAGE.JP: かに、一週間前の僕は、鈴と本当の恋をするために、この困難を乗り越えてくれることを願った。
MESSAGE.EN: A week ago I had prayed that she'd overcome these hardships, so that our relationship would mature.
MESSAGE.Translation: A week ago I had prayed that she'd overcome these hardships, so that our relationship would mature.

MESSAGE.JP: も、今目の前にいる鈴は…みんなと一緒にいたときよりも弱くなってしまっているじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: But when I look at her now... She's become even weaker than when she used to be with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when I look at her now... She's become even weaker than when she used to be with us.

MESSAGE.JP: の先の困難も乗り越えていけるようにはとても思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I doubt she can deal with the troubles imposed on her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I doubt she can deal with the troubles imposed on her.

MESSAGE.JP: れより、大切な何かが失われる…そっちの不安のほうが大きい。
MESSAGE.EN: And what's more... something much more important could be lost in the process.
MESSAGE.Translation: And what's more... something much more important could be lost in the process.

MESSAGE.JP: は…どうしたらいい？
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: か…助言してほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted someone to help me...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted someone to help me...

MESSAGE.JP: しい道を教えてほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted someone to show me the right way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted someone to show me the right way.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は途方に暮れて、うずくまってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was at a complete loss.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was at a complete loss.

MESSAGE.JP: のとき…
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly I...
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly I...

MESSAGE.JP: ―おまえは一塁を目指せ！
MESSAGE.EN: ――To first base!
MESSAGE.Translation: ――To first base!

MESSAGE.JP: の声を思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered that voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered that voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: もしい謙吾の声だ。
MESSAGE.EN: His reassuring voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: His reassuring voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾と話がしたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to talk to Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to talk to Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: の時のように、僕を走らせてほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted him to help me run forward like that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted him to help me run forward like that time.

MESSAGE.JP: は夜を待った。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited until nightfall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited until nightfall.

MESSAGE.JP: んなが食べている中、僕は自分のぶんと、鈴のぶんの食事を自分の部屋に運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: When everyone else was in the cafeteria, I took my and Rin's dinner to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: When everyone else was in the cafeteria, I took my and Rin's dinner to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: ちろん、鈴がみんなの前に出てこれないからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin didn't want to see anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin didn't want to see anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 人には、別の部屋で寝てくれるように頼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked Masato to sleep in another room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked Masato to sleep in another room.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は何も言わず、頷いてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: He agreed without asking why.
MESSAGE.Translation: He agreed without asking why.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「嫌なことを思い出させて悪いけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to remind you again, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to remind you again, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 茶碗を持つ鈴が顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked up at me, holding a bowl of rice in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked up at me, holding a bowl of rice in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「向こうにいる間に謙吾にも連絡を取ろうとした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you try contacting Kengo over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you try contacting Kengo over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: をくるっと横に振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は…謙吾だけは、味方だと信じてるんだ、今も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think... Kengo is our only ally now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think... Kengo is our only ally now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う静かに語り始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her in a quiet tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her in a quiet tone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「味方っていう言い方もおかしいな…ほかのみんなが敵みたいだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's weird to put it this way... I don't mean to say everyone else is our enemy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's weird to put it this way... I don't mean to say everyone else is our enemy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなも多分、必死に耐えてるんだと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure they're having a tough time too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure they're having a tough time too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは未来の鈴のためであって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know it's for your own good...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know it's for your own good...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、謙吾だけは、今の鈴や僕のことを考えてくれると思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But only Kengo thinks of you and me now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But only Kengo thinks of you and me now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから…ご飯食べた後、ここに呼んでもいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So... when you finish eating, I want to call him over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So... when you finish eating, I want to call him over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…どんな顔したらいいのかわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I don't know how to face him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I don't know how to face him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾にさえもか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Was she unable to trust even Kengo...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she unable to trust even Kengo...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いつも通りでいいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just act like always.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just act like always.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それももうよくわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't even remember what it was like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't even remember what it was like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、上のベッドで、布団に猫と一緒にくるまってたらいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then take some cats with you and get to the upper bunk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then take some cats with you and get to the upper bunk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでようやく、聞き入れてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She finally complied.
MESSAGE.Translation: She finally complied.

MESSAGE.JP: 話をかけると、すぐ謙吾はやってきてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I called Kengo and he immediately came to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called Kengo and he immediately came to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらずの馬鹿なジャンパー姿でなんだかほっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, I was happy to see him in that ridiculous jumper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, I was happy to see him in that ridiculous jumper.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらず厳かな姿で、頼もしい。
MESSAGE.EN: He had his usual traditional clothes on.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had his usual traditional clothes on.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「鈴はいないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Where is Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Where is Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ベッドにいるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In the bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はこんもり盛り上がる布団を指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed at the bulge under the blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed at the bulge under the blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「具合でも悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is she feeling sick?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is she feeling sick?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…そのことなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, about that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, about that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなが、鈴のことを考えて…その、言い方は悪いけど、見放してるのはわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know everyone thinks about Rin... but casting her aside, you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know everyone thinks about Rin... but casting her aside, you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、それは逆効果だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's having the opposite effect...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's having the opposite effect...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴は…前よりダメな子に…なる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's going to become even more helpless than before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's going to become even more helpless than before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾と会うことだって、ああして…もう…怯えてしまってるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look... She's even afraid of meeting you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look... She's even afraid of meeting you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今はもう…僕しか信用してない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She only seems to trust me now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She only seems to trust me now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今更みんなを説得なんてできないだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know how to persuade the others...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know how to persuade the others...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、恭介が立ちはだかる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And Kyousuke will be in my way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Kyousuke will be in my way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そこで、僕は思いついたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I thought...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I thought...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴を連れて、逃げようって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...that I'd run away with Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...that I'd run away with Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は目を伏せたまま訊いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo listened to me with his eyes fixed on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo listened to me with his eyes fixed on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: も答えてはくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't say a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't say a word.

MESSAGE.JP: から僕は訊いてみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: So I asked him.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I asked him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、謙吾…それは正しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, Kengo... Is this the right way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, Kengo... Is this the right way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「答えを教えてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let me tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let me tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえたちふたりが、今のまま逃げたとしたなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you two run away now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you two run away now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その先には暗闇しかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...you'll have nothing but despair waiting for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...you'll have nothing but despair waiting for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…僕には、鈴は守りきれないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you saying... I won't be able to protect Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you saying... I won't be able to protect Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そこに光はない。一度手を離したなら、二度と鈴は取り戻せないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There will be no light of hope. If you let go of her hand even once, you will never get her back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There will be no light of hope. If you let go of her hand even once, you will never get her back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それでも、行く気か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Do you still plan to go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Do you still plan to go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なら…やめる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は謙吾を信じているからこそこうして呼んだわけだし、その謙吾が暗闇しか待っていないと言うなら、僕はとどまるべきだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I trust Kengo, and that's exactly why I called him over. If he says so, I should believe his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I trust Kengo, and that's exactly why I called him over. If he says so, I should believe his words.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、時間がないんだよ…もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「時間ならある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There is time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There is time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ないよ…明日の夜には、鈴はまた連れていかれるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それまでしかないんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一週間後の鈴はどうなってるんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そのさらに一週間後は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう鈴は、鈴じゃなくなってるかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は…そんな待っているだけしかできなくて…何もできない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to stand still waiting for that to happen... not being able to do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to stand still waiting for that to happen... not being able to do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何もできない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Not being able to do anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Not being able to do anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なら…一度だって、手を離さない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If so... I will never let go of her hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If so... I will never let go of her hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ずっと、握ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I will hold her hand forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I will hold her hand forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなに強くはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're not that strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're not that strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は見抜いていた。僕は虚勢を張っているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He knew I was just pretending to be tough.
MESSAGE.Translation: He knew I was just pretending to be tough.

MESSAGE.JP: かっていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was no secret to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was no secret to me...

MESSAGE.JP: 安だらけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was uncertain myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was uncertain myself.

MESSAGE.JP: はナルコレプシーという病気持ちだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm suffering from narcolepsy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm suffering from narcolepsy.

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬だって手を離さないなんて、不可能なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Never letting go of her was certainly impossible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Never letting go of her was certainly impossible.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それをはっきり言葉にして突きつけられたのは、堪えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But when he put it so bluntly, it was especially painful.
MESSAGE.Translation: But when he put it so bluntly, it was especially painful.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…僕にも時間が必要ってことだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means... I still need some time too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means... I still need some time too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、時間がないんだよ…もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There is time.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それまでしかないんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もし次までに僕が強くなっていたとしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if I become stronger before she next comes back here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if I become stronger before she next comes back here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一週間後の鈴はどうなってるんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そのさらに一週間後は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう鈴は、鈴じゃなくなってるかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうしてまで作った時間の中でだって、僕は何も変われないかもしれないのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And even then, there's no guarantee I will change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And even then, there's no guarantee I will change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何も変われない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No guarantee you will change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No guarantee you will change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…だったら道はひとつしか残らないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Then there's only one way left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Then there's only one way left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なに？　何が残るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? What way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? What way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恭介と戦う道だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が、道を示した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was showing me the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was showing me the way.

MESSAGE.JP: が、それは僕にはありえない道だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But one that was too much for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But one that was too much for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「戦え、恭介と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「勝てば…リトルバスターズは永遠のものになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you win... the Little Busters will be eternal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you win... the Little Busters will be eternal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、その言葉に反応してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: His words caught my attention.
MESSAGE.Translation: His words caught my attention.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…ずっと、続いていくの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean... everything will be like before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean... everything will be like before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうだ。おまえの望み通りにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Exactly. Isn't that what you wished for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Exactly. Isn't that what you wished for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、僕が恭介に勝てるわけないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I can't win against Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I can't win against Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、矛盾してるよ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're contradicting yourself, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're contradicting yourself, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「強くない僕に、勝てるわけがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I'm not strong, how can I win?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I'm not strong, how can I win?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは、鈴と過ごす今日を自力で手に入れたじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If it wasn't for you, Rin wouldn't be here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If it wasn't for you, Rin wouldn't be here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が指すのは野球で恭介からヒットを打ったことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He was talking about how I got a hit against Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was talking about how I got a hit against Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほとんど偶然だし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was pure fluke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was pure fluke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんのおかげもあるし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And Sasasegawa-san helped a lot too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Sasasegawa-san helped a lot too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえはひとりじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're not alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're not alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえには、俺がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll be there for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll be there for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こいつは…穏やかじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の決意の目を見て、恭介はすぐ事の重大さに気づいたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke realized the graveness of the situation once he saw the fierce look in Kengo's eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke realized the graveness of the situation once he saw the fierce look in Kengo's eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふたりがかりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Two on one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Two on one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そちらも好きに誰でも連れてくるがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can bring whoever you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can bring whoever you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ただ、理樹のパートナーは俺だ。それは譲らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But I will be Riki's partner. This is decided.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But I will be Riki's partner. This is decided.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その手でか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝With that hand of yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝With that hand of yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こんなものは飾りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's a mere decoration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's a mere decoration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふ…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph... Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph... Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I get it now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I get it now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「勝負は何で決する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How do we decide the winner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How do we decide the winner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんでも受けてたとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's up to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's up to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ…どうするかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay... then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay... then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「リトルバスターズは今や野球チームだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The Little Busters has become a baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The Little Busters has become a baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…またマウンドに立つとすっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...How about we settle it on the field?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...How about we settle it on the field?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介が立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「味方の投げるボール、それを先に三本、柵越えさせたほうの勝ちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Your partner pitches the ball, and whoever hits the ball beyond the fence three times first wins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Your partner pitches the ball, and whoever hits the ball beyond the fence three times first wins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「で…そっちの相方は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well... who's your partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well... who's your partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「わりぃーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard someone's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard someone's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返ると、真人がバットを手に、こっちに向かって近づいてくるところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around and saw Masato approaching with a bat in his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around and saw Masato approaching with a bat in his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえの筋肉が活きる時がきたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's finally time to put those muscles of yours to use.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's finally time to put those muscles of yours to use.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「るせぇ、こんなことのために鍛えてなんかねぇんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut up. I haven't been working out for something like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut up. I haven't been working out for something like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「力任せに振れ。それだけでいい。こっちから軌道にボールを投げ入れてやるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All you need to do is swing the bat with all your might. I will make the ball hit the bat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All you need to do is swing the bat with all your might. I will make the ball hit the bat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんな簡単にいくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Doubt it'll be that easy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Doubt it'll be that easy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「でも、負けるわけにもいかねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But I'm not gonna lose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But I'm not gonna lose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人の目がぎろりと動いて、謙吾を射抜くように見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato looked at Kengo as if trying to set him ablaze with his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato looked at Kengo as if trying to set him ablaze with his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ちらもバッターは力のある謙吾が出るに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo will have to be the batter too, being the stronger of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo will have to be the batter too, being the stronger of us.

MESSAGE.JP: なると、このゲームは謙吾と真人の力勝負となる。
MESSAGE.EN: It will be a game of strength between Masato and Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: It will be a game of strength between Masato and Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾に屈することは真人のプライドが許さない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's pride will not allow him to lose to Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's pride will not allow him to lose to Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: から、真人はこのゲームの勝敗が何をもたらすものであれ、僕らと同じように死にものぐるいでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: So he's as serious about the game as us, albeit for different reasons.
MESSAGE.Translation: So he's as serious about the game as us, albeit for different reasons.

MESSAGE.JP: れもまた恭介の計算なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was likely all part of Kyousuke's scheme.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was likely all part of Kyousuke's scheme.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、なんて皮肉なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Consider the irony of the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Consider the irony of the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: んな構図を、僕は見たことがない。
MESSAGE.EN: Four friends glaring at one another defiantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Four friends glaring at one another defiantly.

MESSAGE.JP: なじみの４人が、２対２で睨み合っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I had never seen anything like this before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had never seen anything like this before.

MESSAGE.JP: のひとり、唯一年上の恭介が視線を空に向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke looked up at the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke looked up at the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「雨が降ってきそうだな…すぐ始めようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's going to rain... Better get started already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's going to rain... Better get started already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っちも鈴をあまり長い間ひとりにしてはおけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouldn't make Rin wait for too long, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouldn't make Rin wait for too long, either.

MESSAGE.JP: 攻後攻を決めるじゃんけんを恭介とする。
MESSAGE.EN: We played rock-paper-scissors to decide who goes first.
MESSAGE.Translation: We played rock-paper-scissors to decide who goes first.

MESSAGE.JP: が勝った。
MESSAGE.EN: I won.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どっちがいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I pick?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I pick?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「練習がなしなら、後攻だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We need to warm up, let's go after them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We need to warm up, let's go after them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは後攻を選んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to go second.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to go second.

MESSAGE.JP: 介が形だけのグローブを持って、マウンドに立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke put on a glove for no apparent reason and took the mound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke put on a glove for no apparent reason and took the mound.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「素振りしてみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Try swinging the bat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Try swinging the bat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の指示に頷き、真人がバッターボックスに入り、素振りを始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato followed his orders and entered the box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato followed his orders and entered the box.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「全力でだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Use all your strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Use all your strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「言われなくても、オレはいつだって全力だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No need to tell me, I always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No need to tell me, I always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「オーケー。じゃ、始めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: There was a certain sacredness to it, a vague feeling of the holy... The image of crucified Christ flashed in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「$K9コールドゲーム$K0だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝$K9Called game$K0.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝$K9Called game$K0.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の一言だけを残して、恭介は雨の中に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He only said that as he disappeared into the rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: He only said that as he disappeared into the rain.

MESSAGE.JP: はしばらく部屋で呆然としていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I lay in my room dumbfounded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lay in my room dumbfounded.

MESSAGE.JP: 気になった謙吾ですら…恭介には敵わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even Kengo couldn't win against Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even Kengo couldn't win against Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: の後謙吾も、泥まみれのまま姿を消した。
MESSAGE.EN: Still plastered with mud, he simply went off somewhere after that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still plastered with mud, he simply went off somewhere after that.

MESSAGE.JP: う何も視界に入っていないような、朦朧とした足取りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: His steps had been heavy, as though he couldn't really see anything anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: His steps had been heavy, as though he couldn't really see anything anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: いかけようとした僕を、真人が放っておいてやれ、と制した。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost went after him, but Masato told me to leave him alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost went after him, but Masato told me to leave him alone.

MESSAGE.JP: の後、真人とふたりでお風呂に入って、廊下で別れて…
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I took a bath afterward and went our separate ways.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I took a bath afterward and went our separate ways.

MESSAGE.JP: はまた鈴と過ごす部屋に戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to the room where Rin was waiting for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to the room where Rin was waiting for me.

MESSAGE.JP: は布団にくるまって猫たちと眠っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sleeping in the bed together with her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sleeping in the bed together with her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿は本当に無邪気で…猫たちと仲良しで…
MESSAGE.EN: She looked so innocent... so deeply attached to her cats...
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked so innocent... so deeply attached to her cats...

MESSAGE.JP: までの僕らを象徴しているようで泣けた。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt so much like a symbol of the way we'd been until recently that I felt like crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt so much like a symbol of the way we'd been until recently that I felt like crying.

MESSAGE.JP: うすぐこの眠りから起こされて、温かな布団と猫たちは引きはがされ…
MESSAGE.EN: Soon she would have to wake up and say goodbye to the cats...
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon she would have to wake up and say goodbye to the cats...

MESSAGE.JP: たひとりだけ、冷たい場所へと放り出される。
MESSAGE.EN: Only to be taken to some faraway place.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only to be taken to some faraway place.

MESSAGE.JP: んで鈴だけ、そんな目に遭うんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did Rin of all people have to go through this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did Rin of all people have to go through this...

MESSAGE.JP: っとこうしていられたほうが、絶対幸せなのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: If she stayed here, wouldn't that be real happiness for her...?
MESSAGE.Translation: If she stayed here, wouldn't that be real happiness for her...?

MESSAGE.JP: う僕には何もできないし、鈴に逃げ道はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing I could do, and Rin had nowhere to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing I could do, and Rin had nowhere to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 刑の宣告を待つように、僕は帰ってくる鈴を待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll be waiting for her to come back, as though waiting for my death sentence to be pronounced.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll be waiting for her to come back, as though waiting for my death sentence to be pronounced.

MESSAGE.JP: つか壊れる日まで。
MESSAGE.EN: Until one day things would break down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until one day things would break down.

MESSAGE.JP: はコーヒーカップで手を温めながら、考え続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I considered the possibilities, warming my hands with a cup of coffee.
MESSAGE.Translation: I considered the possibilities, warming my hands with a cup of coffee.

MESSAGE.JP: し、鈴を連れて、逃げ出したとしても…
MESSAGE.EN: If I ran away with Rin...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I ran away with Rin...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は、その先には暗闇しかない、と言っていたけど…
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo had said there would be nothing but despair for us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo had said there would be nothing but despair for us...

MESSAGE.JP: れでも何もせずに見送るよりは…鈴にとって、絶対マシなはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's still better than doing nothing and letting Rin go.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's still better than doing nothing and letting Rin go.

MESSAGE.JP: し、鈴が『そうしたい』と答えたら…
MESSAGE.EN: If Rin says she wants to run away...
MESSAGE.Translation: If Rin says she wants to run away...

MESSAGE.JP: の時は、もう迷わず…
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I won't have to think twice...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I won't have to think twice...

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴を連れ出そう。
MESSAGE.EN: I will take her with me and go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will take her with me and go.

MESSAGE.JP: の辛い日常から。
MESSAGE.EN: And end these painful days.
MESSAGE.Translation: And end these painful days.

MESSAGE.JP: の時のために、僕は支度を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was getting prepared for such a day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was getting prepared for such a day.

MESSAGE.JP: こに逃げればいいだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Where should I run to?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where should I run to?

MESSAGE.JP: 金だけはある。
MESSAGE.EN: I had enough money.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had enough money.

MESSAGE.JP: 親が、僕に残してくれたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents left it for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents left it for me.

MESSAGE.JP: たりの思い出を費やすようで気が引けたけど…
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't particularly happy about spending the only thing I had to remember them by...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't particularly happy about spending the only thing I had to remember them by...

MESSAGE.JP: れを使えば、なんとかなる。
MESSAGE.EN: But with that money we could get by.
MESSAGE.Translation: But with that money we could get by.

MESSAGE.JP: は最後に真人に、電話をかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: At last, I called Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: At last, I called Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『あい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[Hey.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[Hey.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もしもし…僕だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey... It's me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey... It's me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『ああ…どうした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[What's up...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[What's up...]

MESSAGE.JP: を聞いてから、僕はどうして電話なんてかけてしまったんだろう、と不思議に思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Only when I heard his voice did I realize that I didn't know why I had called him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only when I heard his voice did I realize that I didn't know why I had called him.

MESSAGE.JP: も伝えることはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had nothing to tell him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had nothing to tell him.

MESSAGE.JP: えたほうが、止められてることになって、きっと厄介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I told him about my plans, he might try to stop me.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I told him about my plans, he might try to stop me.

MESSAGE.JP: も言わないほうがいいに決まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I should keep quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should keep quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: も、真人は…
MESSAGE.EN: But Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: But Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: っとこの部屋で一緒に過ごしてきた僕のルームメイトで…
MESSAGE.EN: He's my roommate, we've spent so much time together in this room...
MESSAGE.Translation: He's my roommate, we've spent so much time together in this room...

MESSAGE.JP: を鍛えることしか興味のない奴で…
MESSAGE.EN: He's only interested in working out...
MESSAGE.Translation: He's only interested in working out...

MESSAGE.JP: 題も写されてばっかりで…
MESSAGE.EN: He always copies my homework...
MESSAGE.Translation: He always copies my homework...

MESSAGE.JP: も、真人がいたおかげで、すごく楽しい毎日だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was thanks to him that I had so much fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was thanks to him that I had so much fun.

MESSAGE.JP: しくなかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't felt lonely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't felt lonely.

MESSAGE.JP: で視界が霞む…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see clearly through my tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see clearly through my tears.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『…理樹？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[...Riki?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[...Riki?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめんね…部屋から追い出すようなことして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I drove you out of the room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I drove you out of the room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりの部屋だったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: The room belonged to the both of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The room belonged to the both of us.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『いや、気にしてねぇよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[I'm cool with that.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[I'm cool with that.]

MESSAGE.JP: れからは存分使ってね…。
MESSAGE.EN: You can use it all you want from now on...
MESSAGE.Translation: You can use it all you want from now on...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッドから呼ぶ声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a voice coming from the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a voice coming from the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: が起きたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin had woken up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin had woken up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後にそれだけを伝えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I said to him in the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said to him in the end.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『なんかよくわからんが…こっちこそだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[I don't know what you're on about... but...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[I don't know what you're on about... but...]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@『ありがとうな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@[Thank you too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@[Thank you too.]

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉を聞いて電話を切った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hung up the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hung up the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だれか…いるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is someone here...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is someone here...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 安げに訊いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked worriedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked worriedly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、電話だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I just made a call.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I just made a call.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心したのか、ふにゃあとあくびをした。
MESSAGE.EN: She yawned with relief as she spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: She yawned with relief as she spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ねむねむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝*Yawn*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝*Yawn*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あのね、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listen, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listen, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はベッドに両手をついて、鈴と向き合った。
MESSAGE.EN: I leaned on the bed and looked at her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I leaned on the bed and looked at her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたりで逃げよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's run away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's run away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったく意味が通じていないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't understand what I was talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't understand what I was talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴はもう、あそこに戻りたくないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't want to go back, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't want to go back, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちろん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、ふたりで逃げるんだ、今から」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why we should run away, right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why we should run away, right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうしたら、もう戻らなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then you won't have to go back there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then you won't have to go back there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…ほんとうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: きに目を見開く。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes widened in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes widened in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、本当」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, really.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…やった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はただ喜んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was happy.

MESSAGE.JP: れはもう、本当に小さな子供のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was like a small child.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was like a small child.

MESSAGE.JP: 向きに考えようとしていた以前のこととか、これから先のこととか…
MESSAGE.EN: Not thinking about what would happen to her and what was waiting ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not thinking about what would happen to her and what was waiting ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: も考えていない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't think about anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't think about anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 気を消し、鈴を布団に潜り込ませて匿った。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned off the lights and told Rin to hide in the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned off the lights and told Rin to hide in the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: のうちに、寮母さんや見知らぬ大人たちが何度も鈴の居所を知らないかと訪ねてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: That night, the dorm mother and other grown-ups I didn't know came to ask me if I knew where Rin was.
MESSAGE.Translation: That night, the dorm mother and other grown-ups I didn't know came to ask me if I knew where Rin was.

MESSAGE.JP: は知らないと嘘を突き通した。
MESSAGE.EN: I lied that I didn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lied that I didn't.

MESSAGE.JP: 発は朝に決めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to depart in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to depart in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: の行動は危険だと思ったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I figured it'd be dangerous to move out during the night.
MESSAGE.Translation: I figured it'd be dangerous to move out during the night.

MESSAGE.JP: 校から無事逃げ出せたとしても警察に見つかれば、すぐさま補導されてしまうだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if we did manage to leave the school, we'd likely end up in police custody.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if we did manage to leave the school, we'd likely end up in police custody.

MESSAGE.JP: れに、謙吾の不吉な予言もひっかかっていたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I also couldn't get Kengo's words out of my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also couldn't get Kengo's words out of my head.

MESSAGE.JP: ―そこに光はない。
MESSAGE.EN: ――No light of hope.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――No light of hope.

MESSAGE.JP: ―一度手を離したなら、二度と鈴は取り戻せないだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: ――If you let go of her hand even once, you will never get her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――If you let go of her hand even once, you will never get her back.

MESSAGE.JP: は暗闇を恐れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I feared the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I feared the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: い夜が明けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally dawn broke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally dawn broke.

MESSAGE.JP: だ西の空は暗い。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky in the west was still dark.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky in the west was still dark.

MESSAGE.JP: 動部の早朝練習組が起き出すまでも、まだまだある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still time before students would come out for their morning practices.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still time before students would come out for their morning practices.

MESSAGE.JP: たりリュックを背負って、寮を出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We took our backpacks and left the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: We took our backpacks and left the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: のことを考え、ふたりとも私服姿だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of us had our everyday clothes on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of us had our everyday clothes on.

MESSAGE.JP: かだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: んな寝静まっているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was still asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was still asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: の時間には、見回りもいない。
MESSAGE.EN: At this time, there isn't even anyone patrolling the campus.
MESSAGE.Translation: At this time, there isn't even anyone patrolling the campus.

MESSAGE.JP: 門まで辿りつく。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the gates.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the gates.

MESSAGE.JP: は当然のように閉まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously, they were closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously, they were closed.

MESSAGE.JP: が先によじ登り、できるだけ音を立てないようにそれを乗り越えてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I climbed over as quietly as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I climbed over as quietly as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: 物を投げて、と伝えたが、鈴は気付かないのかそのまま格子に手をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I told Rin to throw her bag over the gates, but she didn't hear me and just gripped the gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told Rin to throw her bag over the gates, but she didn't hear me and just gripped the gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 局鈴は、僕よりも器用に地面に降りたってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped over without much effort.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped over without much effort.

MESSAGE.JP: もそも、鈴のほうが運動神経はいいのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, she was more physically fit than me anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, she was more physically fit than me anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: こう。僕が言うと、鈴は首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said we should go, but she shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said we should go, but she shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつら、ついてこない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝They won't come after us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝They won't come after us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の向こうでは、鈴の猫が数匹鎮座して、こちらを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the other side of the gates, several cats were sitting and watching us.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other side of the gates, several cats were sitting and watching us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「レノン、ヒョードルっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Lennon, Fyodor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Lennon, Fyodor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「オードリーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Audrey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Audrey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちの名を呼んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out her cats' names.
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out her cats' names.

MESSAGE.JP: はそんな大きな声を出したら、誰かに気付かれないかと不安でならない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried that someone would hear her loud voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried that someone would hear her loud voice.

MESSAGE.JP: も、止めることはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't stop her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't stop her.

MESSAGE.JP: は悲痛に呼び続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept desperately calling out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept desperately calling out.

MESSAGE.JP: び続けたが…どの猫も、門を越えてはこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But... not a single cat came over to this side.
MESSAGE.Translation: But... not a single cat came over to this side.

MESSAGE.JP: たちがまるで申し合わせたように背を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats turned away from us as if they agreed upon it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats turned away from us as if they agreed upon it.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま、来た道を引き返していく。
MESSAGE.EN: And went back the way they came.
MESSAGE.Translation: And went back the way they came.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「つれてくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll go get them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll go get them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が門に手をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin put her hand on the gates.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin put her hand on the gates.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だめだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の肩を掴んで止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I clutched her shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I clutched her shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう時間がないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We don't have time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We don't have time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 死に訴える。
MESSAGE.EN: I desperately appealed to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I desperately appealed to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 間がないのもあったけど、気持ちとしても、あいつらを連れていく気にはなれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't have time, but there was another reason I didn't want to take the cats with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't have time, but there was another reason I didn't want to take the cats with us.

MESSAGE.JP: う。あいつらは全部、恭介の連れてきた猫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were all cats Kyousuke had found.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were all cats Kyousuke had found.

MESSAGE.JP: ノンなんて、その手先だったじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Lennon was one of his subordinates.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon was one of his subordinates.

MESSAGE.JP: こに逃げても、見透かされているようで、落ち着けない。そんな暮らしはごめんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to live in fear that he still somehow kept tabs on us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to live in fear that he still somehow kept tabs on us.

MESSAGE.JP: には悪いけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt sorry for Rin, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt sorry for Rin, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「猫は…僕がまたプレゼントするから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you need a cat... I will get you one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you need a cat... I will get you one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から、そう約束した。
MESSAGE.EN: I promised to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I promised to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寂しいのはわかるけど…今はいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know you feel lonely... but we must go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know you feel lonely... but we must go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理矢理、門から引き離した。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled her away from the gates.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled her away from the gates.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、たくさんあったはずの大事なものを残して…
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, we left so many precious things behind...
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, we left so many precious things behind...

MESSAGE.JP: の朝、僕たちは逃げ出した。
MESSAGE.EN: And ran away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And ran away.

MESSAGE.JP: たちは電車に揺られていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We boarded a train.
MESSAGE.Translation: We boarded a train.

MESSAGE.JP: げ出したといっても、あてなく発ったわけではない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's true we ran away, but it's not like we didn't have a destination.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's true we ran away, but it's not like we didn't have a destination.

MESSAGE.JP: 車に乗ってから、行き先を鈴に相談した。
MESSAGE.EN: I consulted Rin about where we should go once we got on the train.
MESSAGE.Translation: I consulted Rin about where we should go once we got on the train.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らふたりだけじゃ、アパートを借りることも叶わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can't rent an apartment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can't rent an apartment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「かといって、ホームレスみたいな暮らしも、大人の目につきやすくて危険だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But if we live on the street, we will stand out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But if we live on the street, we will stand out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すぐ捕まってしまうだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We won't enjoy our freedom for too long like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We won't enjoy our freedom for too long like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、ひとまず、知っている人の家に隠れようと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I think we should go to someone we know first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I think we should go to someone we know first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…理樹の知り合いか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Someone you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Someone you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴も知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know him too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know him too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴のおじいちゃんの家だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm talking about your grandpa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm talking about your grandpa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは、つまり、恭介の祖父の家でもある。
MESSAGE.EN: As in, Kyousuke's grandfather.
MESSAGE.Translation: As in, Kyousuke's grandfather.

MESSAGE.JP: 介から逃げたいのに、その縁者にすがるなど愚かしいとも思える。
MESSAGE.EN: It may seem foolish to seek refuge in such a place even though we're hiding from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: It may seem foolish to seek refuge in such a place even though we're hiding from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕は、恭介が、その祖父を苦手としていることを覚えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I remembered well that Kyousuke was on bad terms with his grandfather.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I remembered well that Kyousuke was on bad terms with his grandfather.

MESSAGE.JP: して、鈴が懐いていることも。
MESSAGE.EN: And that Rin was attached to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that Rin was attached to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう何年前になるだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't remember how many years ago it was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't remember how many years ago it was...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「リトルバスターズの合宿と称して、みんなで行ったの覚えてるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Back then, we had gone on a Little Busters training camp.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Back then, we had gone on a Little Busters training camp.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 宿自体を発案したのはもちろん恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kyousuke's idea to go somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kyousuke's idea to go somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: が、行き先の提案は珍しく鈴だった。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was Rin who decided where to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was Rin who decided where to go.

MESSAGE.JP: じーちゃんちにいきたい』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I want to go to grandpa's house.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I want to go to grandpa's house.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れを訊いた恭介が、苦々しく顔を歪めたのを今もよく覚えている。
MESSAGE.EN: I still remember Kyousuke's frown of displeasure when he heard her say that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still remember Kyousuke's frown of displeasure when he heard her say that.

MESSAGE.JP: の、恭介がだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: That Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: の時、どうして決行したのかはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why he decided to go to his grandfather's house regardless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why he decided to go to his grandfather's house regardless.

MESSAGE.JP: の希望を叶えたかったのか、あるいは、今の成長した自分なら勝ち目があると信じたか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe he just listened to Rin's wish, or maybe he thought he could win now that he'd grown.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe he just listened to Rin's wish, or maybe he thought he could win now that he'd grown.

MESSAGE.JP: 果はぼろ負けだった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, it was a complete defeat for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, it was a complete defeat for him.

MESSAGE.JP: 父の繰り出してくる遊び（恭介で言うところのミッション）に、連戦連敗。
MESSAGE.EN: He lost in every game (or ❛mission❜ as Kyousuke called them) his grandfather came up with.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lost in every game (or ❛mission❜ as Kyousuke called them) his grandfather came up with.

MESSAGE.JP: 介にだけはきつい罰ゲームが課せられ、後にも先にも見ることができないような恥ずべき姿を僕たちに晒すことになったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: As the loser he always had to go through humiliation and embarrassment, which was something he'd rarely experienced.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the loser he always had to go through humiliation and embarrassment, which was something he'd rarely experienced.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、今思い出しても、おかしかった。痛快だった。
MESSAGE.EN: All of it was just so hysterical.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of it was just so hysterical.

MESSAGE.JP: も思い出してるのだろうか、笑みを作っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin must have recalled that time too, as a smile crossed her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin must have recalled that time too, as a smile crossed her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの人なら、鈴を守ってくれる。たとえ恭介がきたって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure he will protect you even if Kyousuke comes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure he will protect you even if Kyousuke comes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, let's go there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, let's go there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 旅になった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a long journey.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a long journey.

MESSAGE.JP: 父の家に着いたのは、夕方だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was evening when we arrived by her grandfather's house.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was evening when we arrived by her grandfather's house.

MESSAGE.JP: び鈴を鳴らしても、誰も出てこない。
MESSAGE.EN: We rang the bell but no one came out.
MESSAGE.Translation: We rang the bell but no one came out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…出かけてるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe he's out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe he's out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: で待っているのも不審だったので、門をくぐり、勝手に庭にお邪魔する。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd look suspicious waiting for him at the gate, so we let ourselves in the yard.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd look suspicious waiting for him at the gate, so we let ourselves in the yard.

MESSAGE.JP: かしい風景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sight brought back so many memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sight brought back so many memories.

MESSAGE.JP: こでかつて、みんなで合宿と称して生活をした。
MESSAGE.EN: We had called this place our training camp.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had called this place our training camp.

MESSAGE.JP: ろんなゲームに挑戦した。
MESSAGE.EN: Played all sorts of games.
MESSAGE.Translation: Played all sorts of games.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ、そんなこともできないのか、という不敵な祖父の笑みが蘇ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I still remember the man's sly smile when he dared us to try something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still remember the man's sly smile when he dared us to try something.

MESSAGE.JP: の僕らにとっては、頼もしい、笑みだった。
MESSAGE.EN: How I'd love to see him smile like that now.
MESSAGE.Translation: How I'd love to see him smile like that now.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間ぐらい待っただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: We waited for roughly an hour.
MESSAGE.Translation: We waited for roughly an hour.

MESSAGE.JP: 飯の時間だ。出かけているなら、帰ってきてもよさそうなものだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was time for dinner. If he was out, it was about time he came back.
