MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, myself and numerous cats; we weren't lacking in mouths to feed.

MESSAGE.JP: か手段はないかと、納戸を探してみると、釣りざおを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: In looking for solutions, I found a fishing rod in the shed.
MESSAGE.Translation: In looking for solutions, I found a fishing rod in the shed.

MESSAGE.JP: いぶ古いものだったが、手入れはしっかりしているようで、リールも綺麗に回った。
MESSAGE.EN: Although clearly aged, the reel was well-maintained and still worked well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although clearly aged, the reel was well-maintained and still worked well.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと海に行ってくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going to the sea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to the sea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うみ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The sea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The sea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これこれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: には釣りざおとバケツ。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed her the rod and bucket in my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed her the rod and bucket in my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「魚釣り」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fishing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fishing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の香りと、打ち寄せる波。
MESSAGE.EN: The smell of salt, and the lapping waves.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smell of salt, and the lapping waves.

MESSAGE.JP: は途中にあった雑貨屋さんで何とかなった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had purchased some bait at a general store on the way here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had purchased some bait at a general store on the way here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（でも、釣りなんて何年ぶりかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(When was it I last fished...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(When was it I last fished...?)

MESSAGE.JP: に餌をつけて、軽く投げ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Hooking the bait, I swung the line into the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hooking the bait, I swung the line into the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 暗い青色に蛍光色のウキが浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The fluorescent-colored bobber moved upon the dim blue surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fluorescent-colored bobber moved upon the dim blue surface.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（あとはウキが沈んだらいいんだっけ…？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(And the rest is just waiting until the bobber is pulled down, I guess...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(And the rest is just waiting until the bobber is pulled down, I guess...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 、ぴくぴくとウキが動き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next moment, it began moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next moment, it began moving.

MESSAGE.JP: わせるように竿を引くと、確かな手ごたえが伝わってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel a fish on the hook as I pulled the rod up in tune with the prey's motion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel a fish on the hook as I pulled the rod up in tune with the prey's motion.

MESSAGE.JP: りかり、と急いでリールを巻くと、２０ｃｍくらいの魚がかかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly reeled up and grabbed hold of a 20-cm'ish fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly reeled up and grabbed hold of a 20-cm'ish fish.

MESSAGE.JP: ケツに放り込むと、青白く光っている魚は緩やかにまた泳ぎだす。
MESSAGE.EN: After I threw it into the bucket, it began swimming slowly in a circle.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I threw it into the bucket, it began swimming slowly in a circle.

MESSAGE.JP: し。この調子で釣れれば、しばらくは困らないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Good. If I could get more just like this, I wouldn't have to worry about food for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Good. If I could get more just like this, I wouldn't have to worry about food for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: ざざーん。
MESSAGE.EN: ...*Chirp*chirp*...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...*Chirp*chirp*...

MESSAGE.JP: は真上を過ぎ、やや翳りだした頃。
MESSAGE.EN: It was well past noon, and the sun was starting to go down.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was well past noon, and the sun was starting to go down.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「釣れない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No sign of another one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No sign of another one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 初の一匹で運を使い果たしたのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I might have exhausted all my luck on the first catch.
MESSAGE.Translation: I might have exhausted all my luck on the first catch.

MESSAGE.JP: 一つかかってこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't caught anything since then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't caught anything since then.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、夕方に小さな魚をもう一匹釣り上げただけで、その日は終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually I was only able to get one more small fish, and then the day came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually I was only able to get one more small fish, and then the day came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ、二人分だからいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, at least I've got enough for the two of us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, at least I've got enough for the two of us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 飯を炊いて、おみそ汁を作る。
MESSAGE.EN: I cooked rice and miso soup.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cooked rice and miso soup.

MESSAGE.JP: 間がかかるけど慣れてしまった作業によどみはない。
MESSAGE.EN: Preparing them sure was laborious, though I was already used to it enough to do it flawlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Preparing them sure was laborious, though I was already used to it enough to do it flawlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 味料の類が一通り揃ってるのが何よりありがたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thankfully, there were almost all types of seasoning necessary in the kitchen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thankfully, there were almost all types of seasoning necessary in the kitchen.

MESSAGE.JP: きめの魚は半身を塩焼きにして、残りは素焼きにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I cut the big fish into two pieces: one half for broiling plain and the other with salt.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cut the big fish into two pieces: one half for broiling plain and the other with salt.

MESSAGE.JP: さいのは僕の分だから、適当に塩を振って丸焼き。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the smaller fish was mine, I merely sprinkled salt on it and broiled it as it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the smaller fish was mine, I merely sprinkled salt on it and broiled it as it was.

MESSAGE.JP: はかなりいびつだけど、美味しそうにできあがった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though they weren't really great in shape, I managed to make them look appetizing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though they weren't really great in shape, I managed to make them look appetizing.

MESSAGE.JP: 膳を揃えて、机に載せる。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, I set the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, I set the table.

MESSAGE.JP: とは、残りご飯を皿に持って、おみそ汁を少しと素焼きにした魚を添えて終わり。
MESSAGE.EN: What was left then was to serve the rice, miso soup and fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was left then was to serve the rice, miso soup and fish.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごはんだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Dinner is ready.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Dinner is ready.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えたのか、鈴より先に猫たちが走ってきて、僕の足元に擦り寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats were around my feet even before Rin came; they seemed to have learned the meaning of those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats were around my feet even before Rin came; they seemed to have learned the meaning of those words.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちゃんとあげるから待ってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hang on a second. I'm feeding you guys now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hang on a second. I'm feeding you guys now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 卓の周りに猫皿を置くと、みな行儀よく食べてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: I laid the plates for the cats around the table; they were all behaving themselves well while eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: I laid the plates for the cats around the table; they were all behaving themselves well while eating.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…でも、猫用のドライフードでも買っておくべきかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Maybe I should buy some dry cat food for them too.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Maybe I should buy some dry cat food for them too.)

MESSAGE.JP: 構高いけど、一日一食じゃ足りないだろうし。
MESSAGE.EN: I know it's expensive, but one meal a day couldn't be enough for the cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know it's expensive, but one meal a day couldn't be enough for the cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いただきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's dig in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's dig in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うま！　こういうのもいいな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Tasty! I like it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Tasty! I like it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…早いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You ate so fast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You ate so fast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 焼きは思いのほか好評だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The salt-broiled one got a better reception than I expected.
MESSAGE.Translation: The salt-broiled one got a better reception than I expected.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも、たりない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But there's not enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But there's not enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕のを食べていいよ。ちょっとしかないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can share mine with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can share mine with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人でつつきながら、食事を終えた。
MESSAGE.EN: And so we were finished with dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so we were finished with dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: に山となった洗濯物を前に。
MESSAGE.EN: Before me stood a basket full of laundry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before me stood a basket full of laundry.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…こっちにきて、一回も洗ってないからなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haven't done any laundry since we came here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haven't done any laundry since we came here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 飯の調達もあるから、なるべく家のことに時間はかけたくないのが本音だ。
MESSAGE.EN: To be honest, I wanted to dedicate as much of my time as I could for procuring food, not for this kind of housework.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be honest, I wanted to dedicate as much of my time as I could for procuring food, not for this kind of housework.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 側で猫を膝に丸くなってる鈴が聞いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked up, lying curled up on the porch with a cat on her knee.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked up, lying curled up on the porch with a cat on her knee.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、洗濯しようかなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm about to do the laundry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm about to do the laundry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の服も替えが少なくなってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm running out of clothes to change into.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm running out of clothes to change into.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、日が高くなる前に終わらせるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I'm gonna get it done by noon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I'm gonna get it done by noon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「他のもあったら言ってね、鈴の服も一緒に入ってるみたいだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me know if you've got anything else to wash. I see some of your clothes in the basket too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me know if you've got anything else to wash. I see some of your clothes in the basket too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を持って、離れの途中にある洗濯機まで…
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted up the basket and started to make my way to the washing machine...
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted up the basket and started to make my way to the washing machine...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？　どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm? What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm? What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごい剣幕で迫ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed in upon me furiously.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed in upon me furiously.

MESSAGE.JP: たちもびっくりしたのか、遠巻きに眺めているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Taken by surprise, the cats were just watching her from a distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taken by surprise, the cats were just watching her from a distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹はあっちいけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you go away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you go away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「洗濯はあたしがする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll do the laundry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll do the laundry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　いいよ、手伝ってくれなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? No, you don't have to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? No, you don't have to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、あっちいけ！　理樹は魚釣りだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, shoo! You can just go catch fish!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, shoo! You can just go catch fish!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局僕は、外に蹴り出された。釣りざおをバケツ、麦藁帽子の一そろいと共に。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, she kicked me out along with the rod, bucket and a straw hat.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, she kicked me out along with the rod, bucket and a straw hat.

MESSAGE.JP: 方なく、海沿いの道を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up and made my way to the beach.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up and made my way to the beach.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぜんぶ僕がやるのに、なんであんななんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But why was she so adamant about it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But why was she so adamant about it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 濯くらい、僕でも簡単にできるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Washing is so easy even I can do it just fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Washing is so easy even I can do it just fine.

MESSAGE.JP: でだって、ときどき真人の服や下着も一緒に洗っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sometimes I even washed Masato's boxers together with my own clothes back in the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sometimes I even washed Masato's boxers together with my own clothes back in the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれを見てて知ってるのに…
MESSAGE.EN: I know she'd seen me doing that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I know she'd seen me doing that...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 付いて、歩を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: My feet stopped as it finally dawned on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: My feet stopped as it finally dawned on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうか、下着も僕が洗っちゃうところだったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I get it. She didn't want me to wash her underwear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I get it. She didn't want me to wash her underwear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 日、木陰で魚釣りに勤しむ。
MESSAGE.EN: I spent all day fishing in the shade of a tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spent all day fishing in the shade of a tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 日は二匹釣れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The result was two fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: The result was two fish.

MESSAGE.JP: りがけ、路地で無人の野菜売りがあったので、１００円で野菜を買って帰った。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way back home, I came across an unmanned vegetable stall and bought some for 100 yen.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way back home, I came across an unmanned vegetable stall and bought some for 100 yen.

MESSAGE.JP: って帰ってもわからない、と囁く自分の声がするけど、それは越えてはいけない線だ。
MESSAGE.EN: A small voice in the back of my mind whispered that I could just take them, but that's a line I must not cross.
MESSAGE.Translation: A small voice in the back of my mind whispered that I could just take them, but that's a line I must not cross.

MESSAGE.JP: に見えて、食事が貧しくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Our meals were becoming increasingly poor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our meals were becoming increasingly poor.

MESSAGE.JP: 飯はあるけど、おかずがない日が多くなった。
MESSAGE.EN: We still had plenty of rice, but it was getting difficult to prepare any dishes.
MESSAGE.Translation: We still had plenty of rice, but it was getting difficult to prepare any dishes.

MESSAGE.JP: 所にある一抱えもある米びつは、そのうち底をつくだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And it was just a matter of time before we ate up the rice too.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it was just a matter of time before we ate up the rice too.

MESSAGE.JP: きる限りお金を使わないように切り詰めても、必要な品は出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how hard I tried to save money, there was always something essential to buy.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how hard I tried to save money, there was always something essential to buy.

MESSAGE.JP: しずつ買い足すと、身を削られるような恐怖感が一枚、また一枚と張りついていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time I purchased something, fear grew a little larger inside my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time I purchased something, fear grew a little larger inside my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: は釣れない日もあった。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, there were days when I didn't come by any fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, there were days when I didn't come by any fish.

MESSAGE.JP: 子がよく、十数匹釣った日もあったけど、全部食べられるとはかぎらない。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was on a roll, I managed to catch around ten of them in a day, though they might not all be edible.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was on a roll, I managed to catch around ten of them in a day, though they might not all be edible.

MESSAGE.JP: は日持ちしないし、煮炊きしてもせいぜい数日が限度。
MESSAGE.EN: Fish didn't keep well; even if cooked, they only stayed good a few days at the longest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Fish didn't keep well; even if cooked, they only stayed good a few days at the longest.

MESSAGE.JP: れに毎日同じ食事だと、誰もが飽きてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Besides that, anybody would get fed up with eating the same food every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Besides that, anybody would get fed up with eating the same food every day.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、鈴は文句ひとつ言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, Rin never complained.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, Rin never complained.

MESSAGE.JP: くことができれば。
MESSAGE.EN: If only I could work the way everybody else does.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only I could work the way everybody else does.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、僕の体でできる仕事なんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But there were no jobs out there that I could properly hold.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there were no jobs out there that I could properly hold.

MESSAGE.JP: のおばあさんのところには、倒れてから一度だけ行った。
MESSAGE.EN: I visited that old lady to give her a hand only once after I fell on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I visited that old lady to give her a hand only once after I fell on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: ても心配してくれたが、作業を手伝わせてはくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so worried about me that she wouldn't let me help her in the fields.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so worried about me that she wouldn't let me help her in the fields.

MESSAGE.JP: 然か…。僕でも相手が病人とわかったら、手伝ってもらおうとは思わない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't blame her... I would do the same if someone with an illness offered me help...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't blame her... I would do the same if someone with an illness offered me help...

MESSAGE.JP: 第に月日の感覚がなくなっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Gradually it became hard for me to tell what day of the week it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gradually it became hard for me to tell what day of the week it was.

MESSAGE.JP: ャンネル数の少ないテレビだけが曜日を教えてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: TV was the only way to ascertain the date.
MESSAGE.Translation: TV was the only way to ascertain the date.

MESSAGE.JP: を起こして、食事を作り、魚釣りを繰り返す毎日。
MESSAGE.EN: Waking Rin up, making meals and fishing; every day was just a repetition of this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Waking Rin up, making meals and fishing; every day was just a repetition of this.

MESSAGE.JP: 面上はとても穏やかだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything looked peaceful and quiet on the surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything looked peaceful and quiet on the surface.

MESSAGE.JP: も猫たちと一緒に、縁側で、庭で和んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and her cats were relaxing in the yard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and her cats were relaxing in the yard.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿に癒される僕がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The sight gave me relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sight gave me relief.

MESSAGE.JP: 怖心を抑え込める。
MESSAGE.EN: It allowed me to suppress my fear,
MESSAGE.Translation: It allowed me to suppress my fear,

MESSAGE.JP: とえ、必ず訪れる終焉を、一寸刻みに伸ばしているだけと気づいていても。
MESSAGE.EN: even though I'd already realized that I was just trying to put off the end of our fugitive lives by even the shortest moments.
MESSAGE.Translation: even though I'd already realized that I was just trying to put off the end of our fugitive lives by even the shortest moments.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まきがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No more wood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No more wood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まき？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wood?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wood?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お風呂の」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝For baths.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝For baths.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ああ、焚きつけの薪ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ah, firewood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ah, firewood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手に回ってみると、確かに薪がほとんどなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As she said, there was little left in the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she said, there was little left in the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一回分かなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's just enough for one to take a bath...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's just enough for one to take a bath...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「その辺の木を切ってつくろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's get some wood somewhere around here and chop it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's get some wood somewhere around here and chop it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「生木は水分があるからすごい煙がでるし、ちゃんと燃えてくれないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rough wood gives off a lot of smoke and doesn't burn well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rough wood gives off a lot of smoke and doesn't burn well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、いっぱい枯葉をあつめる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then let's get a bunch of dead leaves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then let's get a bunch of dead leaves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、そもそもこの季節だから枯葉がないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, that's not possible in this season.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, that's not possible in this season.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、どうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do we do then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do we do then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴だけ入りなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can take a bath.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can take a bath.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日は一人分沸かすだけあるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝At least we still have enough for one person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At least we still have enough for one person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「明日からの分は、何とかするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I'll figure out how to get more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I'll figure out how to get more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: か通りがかりの雑貨屋に薪が売ってたと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe that general store sold firewood too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe that general store sold firewood too.

MESSAGE.JP: 先に並べてたのを僕は思い出してた。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered seeing some stacked under the eave.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered seeing some stacked under the eave.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（いくらくらいするんだろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But how much could it cost...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But how much could it cost...)

MESSAGE.JP: う高くないとは思うけど、お金がない今となってはおいそれと買えるものじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It couldn't be that expensive, but I must not forget that we were pressed for money.
MESSAGE.Translation: It couldn't be that expensive, but I must not forget that we were pressed for money.

MESSAGE.JP: きつけの炎に、少なくなった薪をくべる。
MESSAGE.EN: I threw the pieces of firewood into the fire one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: I threw the pieces of firewood into the fire one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: は少なめにしておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: And I put less water in the tub than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I put less water in the tub than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: の方が早く沸いてくれるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: By doing that, the water should get hotter soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: By doing that, the water should get hotter soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「用意できたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bath is ready.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bath is ready.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は頷いてから、着替えを持って脱衣所へと入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nodding to me, Rin went in the changing room with fresh clothes to change into.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nodding to me, Rin went in the changing room with fresh clothes to change into.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子窓の向こうから鈴の声。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice came through the lattice window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice came through the lattice window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お湯、少なくないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Not much water in the tub.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not much water in the tub.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、ごめん。今日はそれで我慢してね。薪が少ないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry. I need you to bear with it, because, you know, there's not much firewood left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry. I need you to bear with it, because, you know, there's not much firewood left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか、なら仕方ないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right then, it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right then, it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んー…肩までつかれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm... my shoulders aren't in the water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm... my shoulders aren't in the water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ゆっくり浸かっていればあったまるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The longer you spend in there, the hotter you'll get.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The longer you spend in there, the hotter you'll get.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のまま黙ると、しばらくばちゃばちゃと水音が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, she fell silent with only the occasional splashing sound carrying out.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, she fell silent with only the occasional splashing sound carrying out.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: た鈴の声。
MESSAGE.EN: Then her voice again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then her voice again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今度はなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹はどうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Won't you have a bath, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Won't you have a bath, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「後で入るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, after you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, after you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「薪がないならもう熱くできないんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But there isn't any more wood to heat the water, is there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But there isn't any more wood to heat the water, is there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「冷めたお風呂にはいったら、風邪ひくんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You'll get a cold if you take a bath in cold water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You'll get a cold if you take a bath in cold water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう暑いから大丈夫だと思うけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think so, since it's already hot out here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think so, since it's already hot out here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はいえ、学校の辺りと違って朝晩は結構冷え込むことが多いからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Though truly, it often got rather cold in the morning...
MESSAGE.Translation: Though truly, it often got rather cold in the morning...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、一日くらい入らなくても大丈夫か。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it doesn't matter even if I miss a bath for just one day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it doesn't matter even if I miss a bath for just one day.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうだ、理樹もいっしょに入ればいいんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I know! You can just take a bath with me now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I know! You can just take a bath with me now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでもないことを名案とばかりに叫んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She threw out the impossible as though it was the greatest idea ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: She threw out the impossible as though it was the greatest idea ever.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、裸だけどいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, you don't mind me seeing you naked?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, you don't mind me seeing you naked?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あ、そーか！　ダメだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ah, right! Forget about it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ah, right! Forget about it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも、理樹が風邪を引くのもいやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I don't want you to catch a cold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I don't want you to catch a cold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は入らなくていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mind going without a bath.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mind going without a bath.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「くっさい奴がとなりで寝てるのもなんかやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want a stinky guy sleeping next to me either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want a stinky guy sleeping next to me either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別の部屋で寝るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll sleep in another room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll sleep in another room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それもやだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want you to do that either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want you to do that either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこかで妥協してよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have to compromise a little here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have to compromise a little here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「妥協か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A compromise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A compromise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、理樹と入る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then I'll take a bath with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then I'll take a bath with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　そこを妥協!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you sure!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you sure!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わーっ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god...

MESSAGE.JP: いから、背中同士が合わさっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: My back is against hers...
MESSAGE.Translation: My back is against hers...

MESSAGE.JP: には何もないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There is nothing between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is nothing between us.

MESSAGE.JP: んな状況初めてだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've never experienced anything like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've never experienced anything like this...

MESSAGE.JP: ったりとくっついちゃってる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm glued so closely to her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm glued so closely to her...

MESSAGE.JP: 分の心臓の音が驚くほど大きく聞こえる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the beating of my heart...
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the beating of my heart...

MESSAGE.JP: 中越しに伝わってるんじゃないかと思うほどだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so loud that I was afraid even Rin could feel it through my back...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so loud that I was afraid even Rin could feel it through my back...

MESSAGE.JP: も緊張しているようで、身じろぎひとつしない。
MESSAGE.EN: She must also be really nervous; she wasn't moving an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must also be really nervous; she wasn't moving an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: 然な空気にするため、なにか世間話でも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should start a conversation to let us relax a little...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should start a conversation to let us relax a little...

MESSAGE.JP: 理だ、無理…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I can't...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I can't...

MESSAGE.JP: ら、こんなドキドキしてるんですから。
MESSAGE.EN: Not with my heart pounding this hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not with my heart pounding this hard.

MESSAGE.JP: の僕も緊張しすぎて、何も思い浮かばない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't think of anything to talk about...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't think of anything to talk about...

MESSAGE.JP: 春期なんだから、仕方ないでしょ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm going through puberty too, how can you blame me?
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm going through puberty too, how can you blame me?

MESSAGE.JP: て、誰にいいわけしてるんだよ、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, who am I making excuses to...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, who am I making excuses to...

MESSAGE.JP: から流れ落ちてくるのは、なんの汗だ？
MESSAGE.EN: What's with all this sweat running down my forehead?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's with all this sweat running down my forehead?

MESSAGE.JP: につかってるんだから、体温が上昇したからだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course it's just caused by the elevation in temperature.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course it's just caused by the elevation in temperature.

MESSAGE.JP: めんなさい、見透かされている通り、緊張の汗です。
MESSAGE.EN: Sorry, who am I fooling? Just as you imagined, it's all from my nervousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sorry, who am I fooling? Just as you imagined, it's all from my nervousness.

MESSAGE.JP: て、また僕、誰と会話してるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, I did it again. Who the heck am I talking to...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, I did it again. Who the heck am I talking to...

MESSAGE.JP: 内の誰かと会話するぐらいなら、鈴と会話したほうが断然有意義だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure it would make much more sense to talk to Rin instead of someone inside my brain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure it would make much more sense to talk to Rin instead of someone inside my brain.

MESSAGE.JP: し、話題を探すぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, let's find a subject.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, let's find a subject.

MESSAGE.JP: わぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Uwah...
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwah...

MESSAGE.JP: みません、何を言っても鈴をびくっと驚かせてしまいそうなんです。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry, but I think anything I'd say would just scare her out of her skin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry, but I think anything I'd say would just scare her out of her skin.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま暴れさせたりしてしまいそうなんです。
MESSAGE.EN: Not to mention piss her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not to mention piss her off.

MESSAGE.JP: うどんな言葉も、それは破廉恥なんです。
MESSAGE.EN: In this situation, pretty much anything you say can sound dirty.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this situation, pretty much anything you say can sound dirty.

MESSAGE.JP: かいね、と言えば、くっついてる背中が、と思われそうだし…
MESSAGE.EN: If I were to say ❛it's warm,❜ it could be taken as ❛your back is❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I were to say ❛it's warm,❜ it could be taken as ❛your back is❜...

MESSAGE.JP: いねと言えば、密着していることをさらに意識させてしまいそうだし…
MESSAGE.EN: If I were to say ❛it's narrow in here,❜ it could make her more aware of our backs sticking tightly to each other...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I were to say ❛it's narrow in here,❜ it could make her more aware of our backs sticking tightly to each other...

MESSAGE.JP: 持ちいいね、なんて言えば、それこそ変態だと思われるし…
MESSAGE.EN: And if I were to say something like ❛it feels good,❜ she would definitely think of me as a pervert...
MESSAGE.Translation: And if I were to say something like ❛it feels good,❜ she would definitely think of me as a pervert...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、もしかしたら、鈴はずっと待っているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, but maybe she's been waiting
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, but maybe she's been waiting

MESSAGE.JP: から、この緊張を解く日常会話が始まるのを。
MESSAGE.EN: for me to start chatting to change this mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: for me to start chatting to change this mood.

MESSAGE.JP: うに違いない。なのに僕ときたら…ああ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That has to be it. In spite of that, god... what the hell am I doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: That has to be it. In spite of that, god... what the hell am I doing...

MESSAGE.JP: い、もう、こんなですから。高速ビートですから。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, I get the message already. You don't need to speed up any more.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, I get the message already. You don't need to speed up any more.

MESSAGE.JP: う何を言っても、第一声で声がひっくり返る自信がある…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I'm highly certain that anything I say right now will definitely go into a falsetto from tenseness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I'm highly certain that anything I say right now will definitely go into a falsetto from tenseness.

MESSAGE.JP: りゃもう、絵に描いたようにひっくり返るだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no mistake, I'll squeak like a four-year old...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no mistake, I'll squeak like a four-year old...

MESSAGE.JP: うして、僕の緊張も鈴にばれて、場が余計に気まずくなる…。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she will realize just how nervous I am, and the atmosphere will explode into awkwardness...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she will realize just how nervous I am, and the atmosphere will explode into awkwardness...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、そうだ、最初の一声は、とにかく低く喋ればいいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I get it, that's not gonna happen if I speak in as low a voice as I can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I get it, that's not gonna happen if I speak in as low a voice as I can.

MESSAGE.JP: 張した声のひっくり返り現象が起きれば、なんとそれはいつもの僕の声になる。
MESSAGE.EN: And my voice will just rise to the normal range even if I crack into a falsetto.
MESSAGE.Translation: And my voice will just rise to the normal range even if I crack into a falsetto.

MESSAGE.JP: し…緊張してると悟られないように…低く、とにかく低く第一声を…言うぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: All right... Riki, don't let her realize you're nervous... Just make your voice low...
MESSAGE.Translation: All right... Riki, don't let her realize you're nervous... Just make your voice low...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ボドドドゥドオー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わぁ！　ひっくり返らなかったし、低すぎてデスボイスのようになってしまった！
MESSAGE.EN: Jesus Christ! I didn't go into a falsetto at all! I just sounded like I was in my death throes!
MESSAGE.Translation: Jesus Christ! I didn't go into a falsetto at all! I just sounded like I was in my death throes!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ボドドドゥドオー？　なんだそれは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Bododododuoh? What is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Bododododuoh? What is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えと…なんていうんだろ…魂の叫びというか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... if I had to put it into words... it was some sort of exclamation from my soul.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... if I had to put it into words... it was some sort of exclamation from my soul.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんで魂が叫ぶんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why's your soul exclaiming something...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why's your soul exclaiming something...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはもちろん、今鈴と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course that's because you and I are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course that's because you and I are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わぁ！　爆弾発言するところだった！
MESSAGE.EN: Crap! I was just about to drop a verbal bombshell!
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap! I was just about to drop a verbal bombshell!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしとなんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You and I are what...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You and I are what...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、いや、なんていうか、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, well, I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, well, I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ボドドドゥドオー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「また叫んでるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It shouted again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It shouted again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんでだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because, er...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because, er...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ボドドドゥドオー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bododododuoh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな会話が延々と続いたのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: The dialogue kept going in circles like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: The dialogue kept going in circles like this...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、行ってくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'm leaving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'm leaving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 課となってしまった魚釣りにでかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I set off to go fishing, which had been one of my daily routines.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set off to go fishing, which had been one of my daily routines.

MESSAGE.JP: ツをつかんだのか、最近の釣果は安定していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I seemed to have gotten the knack; the number of fish I caught daily had been steady lately.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seemed to have gotten the knack; the number of fish I caught daily had been steady lately.

MESSAGE.JP: いことなのか、料理の腕も上がっている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: To add to that, I was apparently improving at cooking as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: To add to that, I was apparently improving at cooking as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（でも最近、魚以外あまり食べてないなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But we've only had fish recently...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But we've only had fish recently...)

MESSAGE.JP: 飯と魚の何かが毎日の食事。
MESSAGE.EN: Rice, fish, plus something: these were all we ate every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rice, fish, plus something: these were all we ate every day.

MESSAGE.JP: たちは飽きもせず魚のアラを美味しそうに食べている。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats never got tired of the fish heads and other unsavory bits.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats never got tired of the fish heads and other unsavory bits.

MESSAGE.JP: っそ僕らも猫になりたい、そんな気分だ。
MESSAGE.EN: If only we were cats too.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only we were cats too.

MESSAGE.JP: 辺につくと、まず下準備をしなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I reached the seashore, I started getting ready to fish.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I reached the seashore, I started getting ready to fish.

MESSAGE.JP: サを持ってないので、代わる物を探さないといけないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I had no bait, I had to look around for something to use.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I had no bait, I had to look around for something to use.

MESSAGE.JP: く捕まえるのはミミズや海の周りに居る小さな虫。
MESSAGE.EN: I often caught earthworms or small bugs around the area.
MESSAGE.Translation: I often caught earthworms or small bugs around the area.

MESSAGE.JP: べられないような小魚が釣れたら、それもエサにできる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I captured an inedible tiny fish, I used that for bait also.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I captured an inedible tiny fish, I used that for bait also.

MESSAGE.JP: くなれば素潜りで何か捕れそうな気もするけど、今は網ですくうことができた。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought once the water warmed up I should be able to dive for other things to eat, but for now scooping with a net worked well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought once the water warmed up I should be able to dive for other things to eat, but for now scooping with a net worked well.

MESSAGE.JP: ミズを外れないように、針につける。
MESSAGE.EN: I carefully hooked a worm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carefully hooked a worm.

MESSAGE.JP: く竿を振り出して、しばらく止める。
MESSAGE.EN: And I lightly cast out the rod and waited for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I lightly cast out the rod and waited for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: も無ければそのままリールを巻いてもう一回。
MESSAGE.EN: If nothing came, I reeled up the line and did it again.
MESSAGE.Translation: If nothing came, I reeled up the line and did it again.

MESSAGE.JP: 度か繰り返すと、つつくような感触が手に伝わってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After I'd repeated the process a few times, I felt a nibble on my line.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I'd repeated the process a few times, I felt a nibble on my line.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく我慢して大きい手ごたえと同時に引くと、針がフックする。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't jump into action immediately; I only began to reel up the line when the game gave a bigger nibble, and grabbed hold on the struggler.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't jump into action immediately; I only began to reel up the line when the game gave a bigger nibble, and grabbed hold on the struggler.

MESSAGE.JP: れた魚は魚篭（びく）に入れて、次に取り掛かる。
MESSAGE.EN: Putting the fish I caught in the basket, I started working on the next one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Putting the fish I caught in the basket, I started working on the next one.

MESSAGE.JP: 人で、黙々と。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a word, just by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a word, just by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 後から山に入って、野菜を探した。
MESSAGE.EN: The task for the afternoon was to gather wild vegetables in the mountain.
MESSAGE.Translation: The task for the afternoon was to gather wild vegetables in the mountain.

MESSAGE.JP: 然が豊かなこの地域は、それほど奥に入らなくても山菜が採れた。
MESSAGE.EN: This area was so rich in nature that you didn't need to step deep into the woods for that purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: This area was so rich in nature that you didn't need to step deep into the woods for that purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: 初は難しかったこの作業も、次第に慣れてきて、どの部分を採ればいいのかもわかるようになった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was already so used to it I could tell the edible ones apart from experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was already so used to it I could tell the edible ones apart from experience.

MESSAGE.JP: の山菜だと思っていたわらびは、野生だとこの季節に生えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Brackens, which I'd thought were spring-time ferns, grew bountiful in the wild.
MESSAGE.Translation: Brackens, which I'd thought were spring-time ferns, grew bountiful in the wild.

MESSAGE.JP: カマを取り除き、先端の部分だけを丹念に集める。
MESSAGE.EN: I carefully detached the fiddleheads from the stems.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carefully detached the fiddleheads from the stems.

MESSAGE.JP: 人分だからそれほど量はいらなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have to get that big a load, because there were only Rin and me to eat them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have to get that big a load, because there were only Rin and me to eat them.

MESSAGE.JP: は苦さがあまり好きじゃないようだけど、野菜が足らないからと我慢して食べてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't seem to like the bitterness much, although she restrained herself and ate them because we needed vegetables too.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't seem to like the bitterness much, although she restrained herself and ate them because we needed vegetables too.

MESSAGE.JP: 提げ袋いっぱいに取れたので、今日はもういいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had gathered enough to fill a shopping bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had gathered enough to fill a shopping bag.

MESSAGE.JP: ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided it was time to get back home.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided it was time to get back home.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ちょっといいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Can I have a quick word with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Can I have a quick word with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: がかけられた。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody spoke to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody spoke to me.

MESSAGE.JP: はその声の主が、僕たちの助けとなってくれることを祈りながら振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around, praying for the owner of the voice to be someone who would help us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around, praying for the owner of the voice to be someone who would help us.

MESSAGE.JP: もそれはなんて愚かなことだったろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That was, however, a silly prayer to have.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was, however, a silly prayer to have.

MESSAGE.JP: は疲れすぎていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I must have been too tired to realize my folly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must have been too tired to realize my folly.

MESSAGE.JP: の前に立つのは警察だった。
MESSAGE.EN: In front of me stood a police officer.
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of me stood a police officer.

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「君ね、最近この辺に引っ越してきた子でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝You must be the boy who moved in around here recently.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝You must be the boy who moved in around here recently.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「高町のおばあちゃんから、相談されたんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝Old granny Takamachi-san told me about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝Old granny Takamachi-san told me about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「病気抱えてるんだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝You have some kind of illness, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝You have some kind of illness, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いえ、あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「ああ、そう身構えなくていいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝Ah, you don't have to be so nervous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝Ah, you don't have to be so nervous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「田舎だから、新入りさんは珍しくてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝Newcomers are rare in a country town like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝Newcomers are rare in a country town like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「ところで名前と住んでる場所、教えてくれないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝By the way, can I have your name and address?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝By the way, can I have your name and address?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずい…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is not good...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is not good...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: りじりと後ずさりし、そのまま…
MESSAGE.EN: I backed away from him slowly...
MESSAGE.Translation: I backed away from him slowly...

MESSAGE.JP: 警官@「あっ、待ちなさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Policeman@❝Hey, stop!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Policeman@❝Hey, stop!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目散に走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and took off running.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and took off running.

MESSAGE.JP: 転車で追いかけてくる警官に、僕は歩道脇の段差を飛び越えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I jumped over the ditch on the side of the road so that the police officer had to get off his bicycle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I jumped over the ditch on the side of the road so that the police officer had to get off his bicycle.

MESSAGE.JP: の裏から膝まで抜ける痛みに耐え、もう一度走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I then resumed running, stomaching the pain that shot from the bottom of my feet to my knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: I then resumed running, stomaching the pain that shot from the bottom of my feet to my knees.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま藪の中へ入り、何とか逃げることができた。
MESSAGE.EN: Diving into bushes, I could finally manage to get clear of the officer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Diving into bushes, I could finally manage to get clear of the officer.

MESSAGE.JP: け下りただけなのに、ひどく疲れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I had only made a short run, I was horribly exhausted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I had only made a short run, I was horribly exhausted.

MESSAGE.JP: われている事実がどれだけストレスになっていたか、今更に思い知らされた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: And that made me realize how stressful being chased by someone could be.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that made me realize how stressful being chased by someone could be.

MESSAGE.JP: 回りしたせいか、雑貨屋の近くまで来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that detour, I found myself near the general store.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that detour, I found myself near the general store.

MESSAGE.JP: 先のベンチに座り、ちょっとだけ休むことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: So I decided to take a little rest on the bench in front of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I decided to take a little rest on the bench in front of it.

MESSAGE.JP: こなら警察官が追ってきても、遠目でわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: From this location, I could see far in every direction and spot the police officer if he came.
MESSAGE.Translation: From this location, I could see far in every direction and spot the police officer if he came.

MESSAGE.JP: ると、店先から作業着のおじさんが二人出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Two men in work clothes came out of the store.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two men in work clothes came out of the store.

MESSAGE.JP: おじさんＡ@「棗のじいさんち、最近猫が住んでるってなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man A@❝I heard there are cats living in the Natsume house.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man A@❝I heard there are cats living in the Natsume house.❞

MESSAGE.JP: った名前に、軽く血の気が引いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I grew a shade paler as I heard the name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grew a shade paler as I heard the name.

MESSAGE.JP: おじさんＢ@「ああ、通りかかると庭とかで見かけるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man B@❝Ah, I saw them in the yard when I passed by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man B@❝Ah, I saw them in the yard when I passed by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おじさんＡ@「餌とかどうしてるんだろな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man A@❝How do they get food?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man A@❝How do they get food?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おじさんＢ@「その辺の子供が匿ってるんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man B@❝I figure some neighborhood kids feed them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man B@❝I figure some neighborhood kids feed them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おじさんＡ@「そうだな、あそこ、もう誰も住んでいないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Man A@❝Maybe that's it. Nobody lives there now, anyways.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Man A@❝Maybe that's it. Nobody lives there now, anyways.❞

MESSAGE.JP: え？
MESSAGE.EN: ...What?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What?

MESSAGE.JP: も住んでいない？
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody lives there?
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody lives there?

MESSAGE.JP: のおじいさんは？
MESSAGE.EN: What about Rin's grandfather?
MESSAGE.Translation: What about Rin's grandfather?

MESSAGE.JP: う、あそこに住んでいない？
MESSAGE.EN: Does he no longer live there?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does he no longer live there?

MESSAGE.JP: でしょ？
MESSAGE.EN: That's a lie, right?
MESSAGE.Translation: That's a lie, right?

MESSAGE.JP: を見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was watching the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was watching the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: つてここでみんなと合宿をしたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And I reminisced of us Little Busters having our training camp here.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I reminisced of us Little Busters having our training camp here.

MESSAGE.JP: 時のリトルバスターズは、名の通り、悪を退治して回っていたから、合宿の目的は『強くなること』だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Since what we did back then was, as expressed by our team name, vanquish evil, the purpose of the camp was ❛to become stronger.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Since what we did back then was, as expressed by our team name, vanquish evil, the purpose of the camp was ❛to become stronger.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 介に代わり、祖父の発案の元、特訓は行われた。
MESSAGE.EN: The entire training was directed by Kyousuke's grandfather.
MESSAGE.Translation: The entire training was directed by Kyousuke's grandfather.

MESSAGE.JP: く覚えているのは、ふたり一組で、肩車をした上にコートを羽織って、大人の振りをして酒屋で一升瓶のお酒をできるだけたくさん買ってくる、というものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The part I remembered most vividly was that the four boys pretended to be two adult men by piggybacking inside a tall coat, and tried to buy as much bottled booze as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: The part I remembered most vividly was that the four boys pretended to be two adult men by piggybacking inside a tall coat, and tried to buy as much bottled booze as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: じびきで別れて、僕は恭介と同じチームになった。
MESSAGE.EN: By lot, I got paired up with Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: By lot, I got paired up with Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 手は、真人と謙吾という、体力的に言えば最強の組み合わせだった（鈴は見学だ）。
MESSAGE.EN: Accordingly, the opposing team was formed by Masato and Kengo, both of whom had much better physiques (Rin was a spectator).
MESSAGE.Translation: Accordingly, the opposing team was formed by Masato and Kengo, both of whom had much better physiques (Rin was a spectator).

MESSAGE.JP: けは見え見えだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was predictable which team would win.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was predictable which team would win.

MESSAGE.JP: くら恭介に力があろうとも、僕に持てる一升瓶の数は、相手のどちらにも敵わない。
MESSAGE.EN: However strong Kyousuke was, it was obvious that I would be a heavy drag for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: However strong Kyousuke was, it was obvious that I would be a heavy drag for him.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも僕らは勝った。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, we won.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, we won.

MESSAGE.JP: ちろん恭介のおかげだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Needless to say, that was all thanks to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Needless to say, that was all thanks to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 体どうやってあの数を二本の腕で持ったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I still have no idea how he did that,
MESSAGE.Translation: I still have no idea how he did that,

MESSAGE.JP: 升瓶は次々とコートの中に仕舞われていった。
MESSAGE.EN: but he kept stowing away one bottle after another inside the coat.
MESSAGE.Translation: but he kept stowing away one bottle after another inside the coat.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋の店員さんも、体の大きさに不釣り合いな僕の顔の幼さよりも、そちらに驚いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That was what surprised the clerk more than the imbalance between my childish face and our combined height.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was what surprised the clerk more than the imbalance between my childish face and our combined height.

MESSAGE.JP: さにその中は四次元空間にでもなっているかのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could not help but suspect there might have been a four-dimensional space inside the coat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not help but suspect there might have been a four-dimensional space inside the coat.

MESSAGE.JP: 升瓶の重さでか、帰りの足取りはふらふらだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The bottles weighed so much that Kyousuke staggered on his feet the entire way back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bottles weighed so much that Kyousuke staggered on his feet the entire way back.

MESSAGE.JP: うやく家に辿りついたとき、それらすべてを投げ出して、恭介は地面に倒れた。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as we got back, he threw out all of them and slumped down onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as we got back, he threw out all of them and slumped down onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: して、顎を持ち上げて、どうだといわんばかりに、謙吾と真人を睨みつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: He then raised his chin and stared at Kengo and Masato proudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He then raised his chin and stared at Kengo and Masato proudly.

MESSAGE.JP: という戦力外のハンデを抱えてでさえ、恭介は、その最強の組み合わせに勝ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite me dragging him behind, he gained a victory over the strongest pair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite me dragging him behind, he gained a victory over the strongest pair.

MESSAGE.JP: 介は無敵だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody can beat Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody can beat Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: の時、改めて僕はそれを思い知った。
MESSAGE.EN: The result of the competition taught me that fact anew.
MESSAGE.Translation: The result of the competition taught me that fact anew.

MESSAGE.JP: 利を分かち合うため、恭介は僕に手を差し伸べた。
MESSAGE.EN: He held out his hand toward me, to bask together in the glory of the victory.
MESSAGE.Translation: He held out his hand toward me, to bask together in the glory of the victory.

MESSAGE.JP: れを握りしめた時。
MESSAGE.EN: At the moment I seized his hand,
MESSAGE.Translation: At the moment I seized his hand,

MESSAGE.JP: 時に何にも勝る頼もしさを得た。
MESSAGE.EN: I also seized the most dependable feeling in my life.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also seized the most dependable feeling in my life.

MESSAGE.JP: が、ここには恭介はもういない。
MESSAGE.EN: But he's not with me anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he's not with me anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: 力な僕と、鈴と、猫が数匹。
MESSAGE.EN: There's only Rin, a few cats and my powerless self here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's only Rin, a few cats and my powerless self here.

MESSAGE.JP: び鈴が、突然部屋に鳴り響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden, the sound of the doorbell rang throughout the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden, the sound of the doorbell rang throughout the house.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、今まで聴いたことのない音だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was one thing we'd never heard since our arrival.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was one thing we'd never heard since our arrival.

MESSAGE.JP: と猫たちは、びくっと体を震わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Our hair stood up in surprise, both the cats' and mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our hair stood up in surprise, both the cats' and mine.

MESSAGE.JP: だけが、耳を澄ませていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin alone was straining her ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin alone was straining her ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じーちゃんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It must be grandpa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It must be grandpa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ち上がろうとした鈴を僕は体ごと抑える。
MESSAGE.EN: I held her back as she tried to stand up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held her back as she tried to stand up.

MESSAGE.JP: きしめる形となってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: As a result, I hugged her unintentionally.
MESSAGE.Translation: As a result, I hugged her unintentionally.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うよ、鈴…おじいさんじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, Rin... It's not him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, Rin... It's not him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おじいさんは、呼び鈴なんか鳴らさない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why would he ring his own doorbell?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why would he ring his own doorbell?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「出たら、ダメだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can't get the door...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can't get the door...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…居留守か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Are we gonna pretend nobody's home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Are we gonna pretend nobody's home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ャイムがさらに鳴り渡る。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell kept ringing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell kept ringing.

MESSAGE.JP: たちだけが、自分の居場所を知らしめるように鳴き続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only the cats were crying as if trying to let the visitor know where they were.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only the cats were crying as if trying to let the visitor know where they were.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえたち、ないたらダメだ、居留守中だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys have to stop crying. We're not supposed to be here now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys have to stop crying. We're not supposed to be here now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度は、だんだん！と叩く音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: The one outside began pounding on the door hard,
MESSAGE.Translation: The one outside began pounding on the door hard,

MESSAGE.JP: るのはわかっているんだぞ、というように。
MESSAGE.EN: as though telling us that they knew we were in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: as though telling us that they knew we were in here.

MESSAGE.JP: んなのこっちだってわかってる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I know they know that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I know they know that...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、表にだれかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, someone's outside!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, someone's outside!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を澄ますと、庭のほうから話し声が。
MESSAGE.EN: I strained my ears and heard people speaking in the backyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I strained my ears and heard people speaking in the backyard.

MESSAGE.JP: っちの鍵は閉めたか？
MESSAGE.EN: Did I lock the windows over there?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I lock the windows over there?

MESSAGE.JP: や…開きっぱなしだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No... they were all unlocked.
MESSAGE.Translation: No... they were all unlocked.

MESSAGE.JP: 手は警察だ。踏み込まれる…。
MESSAGE.EN: The ones outside must be the police; they were definitely gonna come in.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ones outside must be the police; they were definitely gonna come in.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「逃げよう、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've got to run, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've got to run, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手を掴んで、引っ張り起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I seized her hand and pulled her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seized her hand and pulled her up.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうしてだ？　なんか悪いことしたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How come? Did we do something bad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How come? Did we do something bad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここは、僕らがいていい場所じゃなかったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It turns out we aren't allowed to live here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It turns out we aren't allowed to live here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、見つかったら、逃げなきゃいけないんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why we have to leave right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why we have to leave right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいからよく聞いて、今から電気を消す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listen up, I'm turning the lights off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listen up, I'm turning the lights off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: げ切るためには、そうする必要があった。
MESSAGE.EN: We needed to do that to escape from them.
MESSAGE.Translation: We needed to do that to escape from them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「絶対、この手を離しちゃダメだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never let go of my hand, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never let go of my hand, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「離したら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: したら…
MESSAGE.EN: If she does...
MESSAGE.Translation: If she does...

MESSAGE.JP: ―一度手を離したなら、二度と鈴は取り戻せないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ――I won't get her back ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I won't get her back ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: う引き返せないんだ、謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no turning back now, Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no turning back now, Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: ちん、と僕は電気を落とした。
MESSAGE.EN: I switched the lights off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I switched the lights off.

MESSAGE.JP: 時に、猫がなぁなぁと音痴な大合唱を始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, the cats started an off-key chorus.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, the cats started an off-key chorus.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's get out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's get out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いやだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「つれてくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm taking them!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm taking them!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じーちゃんもいなかったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If grandpa doesn't come back home...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If grandpa doesn't come back home...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつらともう会えなくなるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I won't be able to see them again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I won't be able to see them again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: らっ、と窓が開く音が。
MESSAGE.EN: There was the sound of a window sliding open.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was the sound of a window sliding open.

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴の体を引きずる。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to drag her along.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to drag her along.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「イルファン！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Irfan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Irfan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が猫の名を叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She yelled the cats' names.
MESSAGE.Translation: She yelled the cats' names.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「メンデルスゾーン！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mendelssohn!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mendelssohn!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が譲らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't budge an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't budge an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「アクタガワ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Akutagawa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Akutagawa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が譲らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't budge an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't budge an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「シューマッハ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Schumacher!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Schumacher!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が譲らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't budge an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't budge an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ガッ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Gu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Gu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はその口を手で塞ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: I covered her mouth with my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I covered her mouth with my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行くんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手のひらに痛みが走る。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a pain in the palm of the hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a pain in the palm of the hand.

MESSAGE.JP: り裂かれるような…熱い痛みだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a slashing... burning pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a slashing... burning pain.

MESSAGE.JP: の歯が食い込み、血が流れ始めてるに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have bitten my hand and it started bleeding.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have bitten my hand and it started bleeding.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I flinched.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flinched.

MESSAGE.JP: の隙に鈴は、僕の手を振り払った。
MESSAGE.EN: As I did, she shook herself free from my grasp.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I did, she shook herself free from my grasp.

MESSAGE.JP: の暗闇の中で。
MESSAGE.EN: In this darkness,
MESSAGE.Translation: In this darkness,

MESSAGE.JP: れは、もう二度と、戻らないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: even though I wouldn't be able to get her back ever again,
MESSAGE.Translation: even though I wouldn't be able to get her back ever again,

MESSAGE.JP: くして、しまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had lost her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had lost her.

MESSAGE.JP: んだん！と大きな足音がいくつも押し入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Many loud footsteps entered the house.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many loud footsteps entered the house.

MESSAGE.JP: して…鈴の悲鳴。
MESSAGE.EN: And then... I heard Rin screaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then... I heard Rin screaming.

MESSAGE.JP: れもすぐ閉ざされた。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was just for a blink of an eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was just for a blink of an eye.

MESSAGE.JP: は…顔を覆う。
MESSAGE.EN: I... buried my face in my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... buried my face in my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: あ…
MESSAGE.EN: Ahhh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ahhh...

MESSAGE.JP: あああああぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁぁ…
MESSAGE.EN: Uwaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh...

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ａ@「京都って何回目？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy A@❝How many times have you been to Kyoto?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy A@❝How many times have you been to Kyoto?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ｂ@「行くのは初めてだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy B@❝Never been there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy B@❝Never been there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ａ@「今時古くさくない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy A@❝Isn't it such an item for a school trip?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy A@❝Isn't it such an item for a school trip?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ａ@「最近だとふつー、海外とかさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy A@❝I wanna go abroad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy A@❝I wanna go abroad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 修学旅行の話題だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They were talking about the school trip.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They were talking about the school trip.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスが一番打ち解けられる行事なのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though it will be the greatest event for the entire class to open up to one another,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though it will be the greatest event for the entire class to open up to one another,

MESSAGE.JP: こに鈴はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin won't be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin won't be there.

MESSAGE.JP: だけいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Only she won't be there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only she won't be there.

MESSAGE.JP: は、鈴を、失ってしまったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have lost her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have lost her.

MESSAGE.JP: れはすべて、僕の弱さのせいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It is all because of my weakness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It is all because of my weakness.

MESSAGE.JP: っと僕に強さがあればよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I'd been stronger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I'd been stronger.

MESSAGE.JP: を守っていける強さがあればよかったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I'd been strong enough to protect her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I'd been strong enough to protect her.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、楽しい修学旅行を鈴と過ごせただろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I had, we would have had a great time on the trip...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I had, we would have had a great time on the trip...

MESSAGE.JP: の先もずっとだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Not just on the trip, but for the rest of our lives as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not just on the trip, but for the rest of our lives as well.

MESSAGE.JP: べてが閉ざされてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: But everything had been shut down.
MESSAGE.Translation: But everything had been shut down.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり生きることとは、失うことなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Living is, after all, losing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Living is, after all, losing.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことずっと昔に知っていたはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something I should have known since ages ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something I should have known since ages ago.

MESSAGE.JP: っと忘れていただけなんだ、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: I had simply forgotten about it all along until now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had simply forgotten about it all along until now.

MESSAGE.JP: がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the voice.

MESSAGE.EN: Yet again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again...

MESSAGE.JP: う、僕はずっと昔にも同じように大事な人を失って、殻に閉じこもった…。
MESSAGE.EN: When I lost my parents, I built a wall around myself to keep other people away...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I lost my parents, I built a wall around myself to keep other people away...

MESSAGE.JP: た同じように現実から逃げるのか、僕は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Am I going to escape from reality in the same way yet again...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I going to escape from reality in the same way yet again...?

MESSAGE.JP: んな僕は嫌だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't like it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't like it...

MESSAGE.JP: いままの僕だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I'm still as weak as I used to be...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I'm still as weak as I used to be...
